113 /*
114  * Immediate data format is determined by the upper bits
115  * bit 31: message type, 0 - data, 1 - control
116  * bit 30: buffers updated, 0 - target, 1 - direct-receive
117  * bit 29: more data, 0 - end of transfer, 1 - more data available
118  *
119  * for data transfers:
120  * bits [28:0]: bytes transferred
121  * for control messages:
122  * SGL, CTRL
123  * bits [28-0]: receive credits granted
124  * IOMAP_SGL
125  * bits [28-16]: reserved, bits [15-0]: index
126  */
127 
128 enum { RS_OP_DATA,
129  RS_OP_RSVD_DATA_MORE,
130  RS_OP_WRITE, /* opcode is not transmitted over the network */
131  RS_OP_RSVD_DRA_MORE,
132  RS_OP_SGL,
133  RS_OP_RSVD,
134  RS_OP_IOMAP_SGL,
135  RS_OP_CTRL };
136 #define rs_msg_set(op, data) ((op << 29) | (uint32_t)(data))
137 #define rs_msg_op(imm_data) (imm_data >> 29)
138 #define rs_msg_data(imm_data) (imm_data & 0x1FFFFFFF)
139 #define RS_MSG_SIZE sizeof(uint32_t)
140 
141 #define RS_WR_ID_FLAG_RECV (((uint64_t)1) << 63)
142 #define RS_WR_ID_FLAG_MSG_SEND (((uint64_t)1) << 62) /* See RS_OPT_MSG_SEND */
143 #define rs_send_wr_id(data) ((uint64_t)data)
144 #define rs_recv_wr_id(data) (RS_WR_ID_FLAG_RECV | (uint64_t)data)
145 #define rs_wr_is_recv(wr_id) (wr_id & RS_WR_ID_FLAG_RECV)
146 #define rs_wr_is_msg_send(wr_id) (wr_id & RS_WR_ID_FLAG_MSG_SEND)
147 #define rs_wr_data(wr_id) ((uint32_t)wr_id)
148

212 /*
213  * rsocket states are ordered as passive, connecting, connected, disconnected.
214  */
215 enum rs_state {
216  rs_init,
217  rs_bound = 0x0001,
218  rs_listening = 0x0002,
219  rs_opening = 0x0004,
220  rs_resolving_addr = rs_opening | 0x0010,
221  rs_resolving_route = rs_opening | 0x0020,
222  rs_connecting = rs_opening | 0x0040,
223  rs_accepting = rs_opening | 0x0080,
224  rs_connected = 0x0100,
225  rs_writable = 0x0200,
226  rs_readable = 0x0400,
227  rs_connect_rdwr = rs_connected | rs_readable | rs_writable,
228  rs_connect_error = 0x0800,
229  rs_disconnected = 0x1000,
230  rs_error = 0x2000,
231 };

393 #define ds_next_qp(qp) container_of((qp)->list.next, struct ds_qp, list)
394 
395 static void ds_insert_qp(struct rsocket *rs, struct ds_qp *qp)
396 {
397  if (!rs->qp_list)
398  dlist_init(&qp->list);
399  else
400  dlist_insert_head(&qp->list, &rs->qp_list->list);
401  rs->qp_list = qp;
402 }
403 
404 static void ds_remove_qp(struct rsocket *rs, struct ds_qp *qp)
405 {
406  if (qp->list.next != &qp->list) {
407  rs->qp_list = ds_next_qp(qp);
408  dlist_remove(&qp->list);
409  } else {
410  rs->qp_list = NULL;
411  }
412 }
413 
414 static int rs_notify_svc(struct rs_svc *svc, struct rsocket *rs, int cmd)
415 {
416  struct rs_svc_msg msg;
417  int ret;
418 
419  pthread_mutex_lock(&mut);
420  if (!svc->cnt) {
421  ret = socketpair(AF_UNIX, SOCK_STREAM, 0, svc->sock);
422  if (ret)
423  goto unlock;
424 
425  ret = pthread_create(&svc->id, NULL, svc->run, svc);
426  if (ret) {
427  ret = ERR(ret);
428  goto closepair;
429  }
430  }
431 
432  msg.cmd = cmd;
433  msg.status = EINVAL;
434  msg.rs = rs;
435  write(svc->sock[0], &msg, sizeof msg);
436  read(svc->sock[0], &msg, sizeof msg);
437  ret = rdma_seterrno(msg.status);
438  if (svc->cnt)
439  goto unlock;
440 
441  pthread_join(svc->id, NULL);
442 closepair:
443  close(svc->sock[0]);
444  close(svc->sock[1]);
445 unlock:
446  pthread_mutex_unlock(&mut);
447  return ret;
448 }
449 
450 static int ds_compare_addr(const void *dst1, const void *dst2)
451 {
452  const struct sockaddr *sa1, *sa2;
453  size_t len;
454 
455  sa1 = (const struct sockaddr *)dst1;
456  sa2 = (const struct sockaddr *)dst2;
457 
458  len = (sa1->sa_family == AF_INET6 && sa2->sa_family == AF_INET6) ?
459  sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6) :
460  sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
461  return memcmp(dst1, dst2, len);
462 }
463 
464 static int rs_value_to_scale(int value, int bits)
465 {
466  return value <= (1 << (bits - 1)) ? value :
467  (1 << (bits - 1)) | (value >> bits);
468 }
469 
470 static int rs_scale_to_value(int value, int bits)
471 {
472  return value <= (1 << (bits - 1)) ?
473  value :
474  (value & ~(1 << (bits - 1))) << bits;
475 }
476 
477 void rs_configure(void)
478 {
479  FILE *f;
480  static int init;
481 
482  if (init)
483  return;
484 
485  pthread_mutex_lock(&mut);
486  if (init)
487  goto out;
488 
489  if (ucma_init())
490  goto out;
491  ucma_ib_init();
492 
493  if ((f = fopen(RS_CONF_DIR "/polling_time", "r"))) {
494  (void)fscanf(f, "%u", &polling_time);
495  fclose(f);
496  }
497 
498  if ((f = fopen(RS_CONF_DIR "/inline_default", "r"))) {
499  (void)fscanf(f, "%hu", &def_inline);
500  fclose(f);
501  }
502 
503  if ((f = fopen(RS_CONF_DIR "/sqsize_default", "r"))) {
504  (void)fscanf(f, "%hu", &def_sqsize);
505  fclose(f);
506  }
507 
508  if ((f = fopen(RS_CONF_DIR "/rqsize_default", "r"))) {
509  (void)fscanf(f, "%hu", &def_rqsize);
510  fclose(f);
511  }
512 
513  if ((f = fopen(RS_CONF_DIR "/mem_default", "r"))) {
514  (void)fscanf(f, "%u", &def_mem);
515  fclose(f);
516 
517  if (def_mem < 1)
518  def_mem = 1;
519  }
520 
521  if ((f = fopen(RS_CONF_DIR "/wmem_default", "r"))) {
522  (void)fscanf(f, "%u", &def_wmem);
523  fclose(f);
524  if (def_wmem < RS_SNDLOWAT)
525  def_wmem = RS_SNDLOWAT << 1;
526  }
527 
528  if ((f = fopen(RS_CONF_DIR "/iomap_size", "r"))) {
529  (void)fscanf(f, "%hu", &def_iomap_size);
530  fclose(f);
531 
532  /* round to supported values */
533  def_iomap_size = (uint8_t)rs_value_to_scale(
534  (uint16_t)rs_scale_to_value(def_iomap_size, 8), 8);
535  }
536  init = 1;
537 out:
538  pthread_mutex_unlock(&mut);
539 }
540 
541 static int rs_insert(struct rsocket *rs, int index)
542 {
543  pthread_mutex_lock(&mut);
544  rs->index = idm_set(&idm, index, rs);
545  pthread_mutex_unlock(&mut);
546  return rs->index;
547 }
548 
549 static void rs_remove(struct rsocket *rs)
550 {
551  pthread_mutex_lock(&mut);
552  idm_clear(&idm, rs->index);
553  pthread_mutex_unlock(&mut);
554 }
555 
556 /* We only inherit from listening sockets */
557 static struct rsocket *rs_alloc(struct rsocket *inherited_rs, int type)
558 {
559  struct rsocket *rs;
560 
561  rs = calloc(1, sizeof *rs);
562  if (!rs)
563  return NULL;
564 
565  rs->type = type;
566  rs->index = -1;
567  if (type == SOCK_DGRAM) {
568  rs->udp_sock = -1;
569  rs->epfd = -1;
570  }
571 
572  if (inherited_rs) {
573  rs->sbuf_size = inherited_rs->sbuf_size;
574  rs->rbuf_size = inherited_rs->rbuf_size;
575  rs->sq_inline = inherited_rs->sq_inline;
576  rs->sq_size = inherited_rs->sq_size;
577  rs->rq_size = inherited_rs->rq_size;
578  if (type == SOCK_STREAM) {
579  rs->ctrl_max_seqno = inherited_rs->ctrl_max_seqno;
580  rs->target_iomap_size = inherited_rs->target_iomap_size;
581  }
582  } else {
583  rs->sbuf_size = def_wmem;
584  rs->rbuf_size = def_mem;
585  rs->sq_inline = def_inline;
586  rs->sq_size = def_sqsize;
587  rs->rq_size = def_rqsize;
588  if (type == SOCK_STREAM) {
589  rs->ctrl_max_seqno = RS_QP_CTRL_SIZE;
590  rs->target_iomap_size = def_iomap_size;
591  }
592  }
593  fastlock_init(&rs->slock);
594  fastlock_init(&rs->rlock);
595  fastlock_init(&rs->cq_lock);
596  fastlock_init(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
597  fastlock_init(&rs->map_lock);
598  dlist_init(&rs->iomap_list);
599  dlist_init(&rs->iomap_queue);
600  return rs;
601 }
602 
603 static int rs_set_nonblocking(struct rsocket *rs, int arg)
604 {
605  struct ds_qp *qp;
606  int ret = 0;
607 
608  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) {
609  if (rs->cm_id->recv_cq_channel)
610  ret = fcntl(rs->cm_id->recv_cq_channel->fd, F_SETFL,
611  arg);
612 
613  if (!ret && rs->state < rs_connected)
614  ret = fcntl(rs->cm_id->channel->fd, F_SETFL, arg);
615  } else {
616  ret = fcntl(rs->epfd, F_SETFL, arg);
617  if (!ret && rs->qp_list) {
618  qp = rs->qp_list;
619  do {
620  ret = fcntl(qp->cm_id->recv_cq_channel->fd,
621  F_SETFL, arg);
622  qp = ds_next_qp(qp);
623  } while (qp != rs->qp_list && !ret);
624  }
625  }
626 
627  return ret;
628 }
629 
630 static void rs_set_qp_size(struct rsocket *rs)
631 {
632  uint16_t max_size;
633 
634  max_size = min(ucma_max_qpsize(rs->cm_id), RS_QP_MAX_SIZE);
635 
636  if (rs->sq_size > max_size)
637  rs->sq_size = max_size;
638  else if (rs->sq_size < RS_QP_MIN_SIZE)
639  rs->sq_size = RS_QP_MIN_SIZE;
640 
641  if (rs->rq_size > max_size)
642  rs->rq_size = max_size;
643  else if (rs->rq_size < RS_QP_MIN_SIZE)
644  rs->rq_size = RS_QP_MIN_SIZE;
645 }
646 
647 static void ds_set_qp_size(struct rsocket *rs)
648 {
649  uint16_t max_size;
650 
651  max_size = min(ucma_max_qpsize(NULL), RS_QP_MAX_SIZE);
652 
653  if (rs->sq_size > max_size)
654  rs->sq_size = max_size;
655  if (rs->rq_size > max_size)
656  rs->rq_size = max_size;
657 
658  if (rs->rq_size > (rs->rbuf_size / RS_SNDLOWAT))
659  rs->rq_size = rs->rbuf_size / RS_SNDLOWAT;
660  else
661  rs->rbuf_size = rs->rq_size * RS_SNDLOWAT;
662 
663  if (rs->sq_size > (rs->sbuf_size / RS_SNDLOWAT))
664  rs->sq_size = rs->sbuf_size / RS_SNDLOWAT;
665  else
666  rs->sbuf_size = rs->sq_size * RS_SNDLOWAT;
667 }
668 
669 static int rs_init_bufs(struct rsocket *rs)
670 {
671  uint32_t total_rbuf_size, total_sbuf_size;
672  size_t len;
673 
674  rs->rmsg = calloc(rs->rq_size + 1, sizeof(*rs->rmsg));
675  if (!rs->rmsg)
676  return ERR(ENOMEM);
677 
678  total_sbuf_size = rs->sbuf_size;
679  if (rs->sq_inline < RS_MAX_CTRL_MSG)
680  total_sbuf_size += RS_MAX_CTRL_MSG * RS_QP_CTRL_SIZE;
681  rs->sbuf = calloc(total_sbuf_size, 1);
682  if (!rs->sbuf)
683  return ERR(ENOMEM);
684 
685  rs->smr = rdma_reg_msgs(rs->cm_id, rs->sbuf, total_sbuf_size);
686  if (!rs->smr)
687  return -1;
688 
689  len = sizeof(*rs->target_sgl) * RS_SGL_SIZE +
690  sizeof(*rs->target_iomap) * rs->target_iomap_size;
691  rs->target_buffer_list = malloc(len);
692  if (!rs->target_buffer_list)
693  return ERR(ENOMEM);
694 
695  rs->target_mr = rdma_reg_write(rs->cm_id, rs->target_buffer_list, len);
696  if (!rs->target_mr)
697  return -1;
698 
699  memset(rs->target_buffer_list, 0, len);
700  rs->target_sgl = rs->target_buffer_list;
701  if (rs->target_iomap_size)
702  rs->target_iomap =
703  (struct rs_iomap *)(rs->target_sgl + RS_SGL_SIZE);
704 
705  total_rbuf_size = rs->rbuf_size;
706  if (rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)
707  total_rbuf_size += rs->rq_size * RS_MSG_SIZE;
708  rs->rbuf = calloc(total_rbuf_size, 1);
709  if (!rs->rbuf)
710  return ERR(ENOMEM);
711 
712  rs->rmr = rdma_reg_write(rs->cm_id, rs->rbuf, total_rbuf_size);
713  if (!rs->rmr)
714  return -1;
715 
716  rs->ssgl[0].addr = rs->ssgl[1].addr = (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf;
717  rs->sbuf_bytes_avail = rs->sbuf_size;
718  rs->ssgl[0].lkey = rs->ssgl[1].lkey = rs->smr->lkey;
719 
720  rs->rbuf_free_offset = rs->rbuf_size >> 1;
721  rs->rbuf_bytes_avail = rs->rbuf_size >> 1;
722  rs->sqe_avail = rs->sq_size - rs->ctrl_max_seqno;
723  rs->rseq_comp = rs->rq_size >> 1;
724  return 0;
725 }
726 
727 static int ds_init_bufs(struct ds_qp *qp)
728 {
729  qp->rbuf = calloc(qp->rs->rbuf_size + sizeof(struct ibv_grh), 1);
730  if (!qp->rbuf)
731  return ERR(ENOMEM);
732 
733  qp->smr = rdma_reg_msgs(qp->cm_id, qp->rs->sbuf, qp->rs->sbuf_size);
734  if (!qp->smr)
735  return -1;
736 
737  qp->rmr = rdma_reg_msgs(qp->cm_id, qp->rbuf,
738  qp->rs->rbuf_size + sizeof(struct ibv_grh));
739  if (!qp->rmr)
740  return -1;
741 
742  return 0;
743 }
744 
745 /*
746  * If a user is waiting on a datagram rsocket through poll or select, then
747  * we need the first completion to generate an event on the related epoll fd
748  * in order to signal the user. We arm the CQ on creation for this purpose
749  */
750 static int rs_create_cq(struct rsocket *rs, struct rdma_cm_id *cm_id)
751 {
752  cm_id->recv_cq_channel = ibv_create_comp_channel(cm_id->verbs);
753  if (!cm_id->recv_cq_channel)
754  return -1;
755 
756  cm_id->recv_cq = ibv_create_cq(cm_id->verbs, rs->sq_size + rs->rq_size,
757  cm_id, cm_id->recv_cq_channel, 0);
758  if (!cm_id->recv_cq)
759  goto err1;
760 
761  if (rs->fd_flags & O_NONBLOCK) {
762  if (fcntl(cm_id->recv_cq_channel->fd, F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK))
763  goto err2;
764  }
765 
766  ibv_req_notify_cq(cm_id->recv_cq, 0);
767  cm_id->send_cq_channel = cm_id->recv_cq_channel;
768  cm_id->send_cq = cm_id->recv_cq;
769  return 0;
770 
771 err2:
772  ibv_destroy_cq(cm_id->recv_cq);
773  cm_id->recv_cq = NULL;
774 err1:
775  ibv_destroy_comp_channel(cm_id->recv_cq_channel);
776  cm_id->recv_cq_channel = NULL;
777  return -1;
778 }
779 
780 static inline int rs_post_recv(struct rsocket *rs)
781 {
782  struct ibv_recv_wr wr, *bad;
783  struct ibv_sge sge;
784 
785  wr.next = NULL;
786  if (!(rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)) {
787  wr.wr_id = rs_recv_wr_id(0);
788  wr.sg_list = NULL;
789  wr.num_sge = 0;
790  } else {
791  wr.wr_id = rs_recv_wr_id(rs->rbuf_msg_index);
792  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)rs->rbuf + rs->rbuf_size +
793  (rs->rbuf_msg_index * RS_MSG_SIZE);
794  sge.length = RS_MSG_SIZE;
795  sge.lkey = rs->rmr->lkey;
796 
797  wr.sg_list = &sge;
798  wr.num_sge = 1;
799  if (++rs->rbuf_msg_index == rs->rq_size)
800  rs->rbuf_msg_index = 0;
801  }
802 
803  return rdma_seterrno(ibv_post_recv(rs->cm_id->qp, &wr, &bad));
804 }
805 
806 static inline int ds_post_recv(struct rsocket *rs, struct ds_qp *qp,
807  uint32_t offset)
808 {
809  struct ibv_recv_wr wr, *bad;
810  struct ibv_sge sge[2];
811 
812  sge[0].addr = (uintptr_t)qp->rbuf + rs->rbuf_size;
813  sge[0].length = sizeof(struct ibv_grh);
814  sge[0].lkey = qp->rmr->lkey;
815  sge[1].addr = (uintptr_t)qp->rbuf + offset;
816  sge[1].length = RS_SNDLOWAT;
817  sge[1].lkey = qp->rmr->lkey;
818 
819  wr.wr_id = rs_recv_wr_id(offset);
820  wr.next = NULL;
821  wr.sg_list = sge;
822  wr.num_sge = 2;
823 
824  return rdma_seterrno(ibv_post_recv(qp->cm_id->qp, &wr, &bad));
825 }
826 
827 static int rs_create_ep(struct rsocket *rs)
828 {
829  struct ibv_qp_init_attr qp_attr;
830  int i, ret;
831 
832  rs_set_qp_size(rs);
833  if (rs->cm_id->verbs->device->transport_type == IBV_TRANSPORT_IWARP)
834  rs->opts |= RS_OPT_MSG_SEND;
835  ret = rs_create_cq(rs, rs->cm_id);
836  if (ret)
837  return ret;
838 
839  memset(&qp_attr, 0, sizeof qp_attr);
840  qp_attr.qp_context = rs;
841  qp_attr.send_cq = rs->cm_id->send_cq;
842  qp_attr.recv_cq = rs->cm_id->recv_cq;
843  qp_attr.qp_type = IBV_QPT_RC;
844  qp_attr.sq_sig_all = 1;
845  qp_attr.cap.max_send_wr = rs->sq_size;
846  qp_attr.cap.max_recv_wr = rs->rq_size;
847  qp_attr.cap.max_send_sge = 2;
848  qp_attr.cap.max_recv_sge = 1;
849  qp_attr.cap.max_inline_data = rs->sq_inline;
850 
851  ret = rdma_create_qp(rs->cm_id, NULL, &qp_attr);
852  if (ret)
853  return ret;
854 
855  rs->sq_inline = qp_attr.cap.max_inline_data;
856  if ((rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND) && (rs->sq_inline < RS_MSG_SIZE))
857  return ERR(ENOTSUP);
858 
859  ret = rs_init_bufs(rs);
860  if (ret)
861  return ret;
862 
863  for (i = 0; i < rs->rq_size; i++) {
864  ret = rs_post_recv(rs);
865  if (ret)
866  return ret;
867  }
868  return 0;
869 }
870 
871 static void rs_release_iomap_mr(struct rs_iomap_mr *iomr)
872 {
873  if (atomic_dec(&iomr->refcnt))
874  return;
875 
876  dlist_remove(&iomr->entry);
877  ibv_dereg_mr(iomr->mr);
878  if (iomr->index >= 0)
879  iomr->mr = NULL;
880  else
881  free(iomr);
882 }
883 
884 static void rs_free_iomappings(struct rsocket *rs)
885 {
886  struct rs_iomap_mr *iomr;
887 
888  while (!dlist_empty(&rs->iomap_list)) {
889  iomr = container_of(rs->iomap_list.next, struct rs_iomap_mr,
890  entry);
891  riounmap(rs->index, iomr->mr->addr, iomr->mr->length);
892  }
893  while (!dlist_empty(&rs->iomap_queue)) {
894  iomr = container_of(rs->iomap_queue.next, struct rs_iomap_mr,
895  entry);
896  riounmap(rs->index, iomr->mr->addr, iomr->mr->length);
897  }
898 }
899 
900 static void ds_free_qp(struct ds_qp *qp)
901 {
902  if (qp->smr)
903  rdma_dereg_mr(qp->smr);
904 
905  if (qp->rbuf) {
906  if (qp->rmr)
907  rdma_dereg_mr(qp->rmr);
908  free(qp->rbuf);
909  }
910 
911  if (qp->cm_id) {
912  if (qp->cm_id->qp) {
913  tdelete(&qp->dest.addr, &qp->rs->dest_map,
914  ds_compare_addr);
915  epoll_ctl(qp->rs->epfd, EPOLL_CTL_DEL,
916  qp->cm_id->recv_cq_channel->fd, NULL);
917  rdma_destroy_qp(qp->cm_id);
918  }
919  rdma_destroy_id(qp->cm_id);
920  }
921 
922  free(qp);
923 }
924 
925 static void ds_free(struct rsocket *rs)
926 {
927  struct ds_qp *qp;
928 
929  if (rs->udp_sock >= 0)
930  close(rs->udp_sock);
931 
932  if (rs->index >= 0)
933  rs_remove(rs);
934 
935  if (rs->dmsg)
936  free(rs->dmsg);
937 
938  while ((qp = rs->qp_list)) {
939  ds_remove_qp(rs, qp);
940  ds_free_qp(qp);
941  }
942 
943  if (rs->epfd >= 0)
944  close(rs->epfd);
945 
946  if (rs->sbuf)
947  free(rs->sbuf);
948 
949  tdestroy(rs->dest_map, free);
950  fastlock_destroy(&rs->map_lock);
951  fastlock_destroy(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
952  fastlock_destroy(&rs->cq_lock);
953  fastlock_destroy(&rs->rlock);
954  fastlock_destroy(&rs->slock);
955  free(rs);
956 }
957 
958 static void rs_free(struct rsocket *rs)
959 {
960  if (rs->type == SOCK_DGRAM) {
961  ds_free(rs);
962  return;
963  }
964 
965  if (rs->rmsg)
966  free(rs->rmsg);
967 
968  if (rs->sbuf) {
969  if (rs->smr)
970  rdma_dereg_mr(rs->smr);
971  free(rs->sbuf);
972  }
973 
974  if (rs->rbuf) {
975  if (rs->rmr)
976  rdma_dereg_mr(rs->rmr);
977  free(rs->rbuf);
978  }
979 
980  if (rs->target_buffer_list) {
981  if (rs->target_mr)
982  rdma_dereg_mr(rs->target_mr);
983  free(rs->target_buffer_list);
984  }
985 
986  if (rs->cm_id) {
987  rs_free_iomappings(rs);
988  if (rs->cm_id->qp) {
989  ibv_ack_cq_events(rs->cm_id->recv_cq, rs->unack_cqe);
990  rdma_destroy_qp(rs->cm_id);
991  }
992  rdma_destroy_id(rs->cm_id);
993  }
994 
995  if (rs->index >= 0)
996  rs_remove(rs);
997 
998  fastlock_destroy(&rs->map_lock);
999  fastlock_destroy(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
1000  fastlock_destroy(&rs->cq_lock);
1001  fastlock_destroy(&rs->rlock);
1002  fastlock_destroy(&rs->slock);
1003  free(rs);
1004 }
1005 
1006 static size_t rs_conn_data_offset(struct rsocket *rs)
1007 {
1008  return (rs->cm_id->route.addr.src_addr.sa_family == AF_IB) ?
1009  sizeof(struct ib_connect_hdr) :
1010  0;
1011 }
1012 
1013 static void rs_format_conn_data(struct rsocket *rs, struct rs_conn_data *conn)
1014 {
1015  conn->version = 1;
1016  conn->flags =
1017  RS_CONN_FLAG_IOMAP | (rs_host_is_net() ? RS_CONN_FLAG_NET : 0);
1018  conn->credits = htons(rs->rq_size);
1019  memset(conn->reserved, 0, sizeof conn->reserved);
1020  conn->target_iomap_size =
1021  (uint8_t)rs_value_to_scale(rs->target_iomap_size, 8);
1022 
1023  conn->target_sgl.addr = htonll((uintptr_t)rs->target_sgl);
1024  conn->target_sgl.length = htonl(RS_SGL_SIZE);
1025  conn->target_sgl.key = htonl(rs->target_mr->rkey);
1026 
1027  conn->data_buf.addr = htonll((uintptr_t)rs->rbuf);
1028  conn->data_buf.length = htonl(rs->rbuf_size >> 1);
1029  conn->data_buf.key = htonl(rs->rmr->rkey);
1030 }
1031 
1032 static void rs_save_conn_data(struct rsocket *rs, struct rs_conn_data *conn)
1033 {
1034  rs->remote_sgl.addr = ntohll(conn->target_sgl.addr);
1035  rs->remote_sgl.length = ntohl(conn->target_sgl.length);
1036  rs->remote_sgl.key = ntohl(conn->target_sgl.key);
1037  rs->remote_sge = 1;
1038  if ((rs_host_is_net() && !(conn->flags & RS_CONN_FLAG_NET)) ||
1039  (!rs_host_is_net() && (conn->flags & RS_CONN_FLAG_NET)))
1040  rs->opts = RS_OPT_SWAP_SGL;
1041 
1042  if (conn->flags & RS_CONN_FLAG_IOMAP) {
1043  rs->remote_iomap.addr =
1044  rs->remote_sgl.addr +
1045  sizeof(rs->remote_sgl) * rs->remote_sgl.length;
1046  rs->remote_iomap.length =
1047  rs_scale_to_value(conn->target_iomap_size, 8);
1048  rs->remote_iomap.key = rs->remote_sgl.key;
1049  }
1050 
1051  rs->target_sgl[0].addr = ntohll(conn->data_buf.addr);
1052  rs->target_sgl[0].length = ntohl(conn->data_buf.length);
1053  rs->target_sgl[0].key = ntohl(conn->data_buf.key);
1054 
1055  rs->sseq_comp = ntohs(conn->credits);
1056 }
1057 
1058 static int ds_init(struct rsocket *rs, int domain)
1059 {
1060  rs->udp_sock = socket(domain, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
1061  if (rs->udp_sock < 0)
1062  return rs->udp_sock;
1063 
1064  rs->epfd = epoll_create(2);
1065  if (rs->epfd < 0)
1066  return rs->epfd;
1067 
1068  return 0;
1069 }
1070 
1071 static int ds_init_ep(struct rsocket *rs)
1072 {
1073  struct ds_smsg *msg;
1074  int i, ret;
1075 
1076  ds_set_qp_size(rs);
1077 
1078  rs->sbuf = calloc(rs->sq_size, RS_SNDLOWAT);
1079  if (!rs->sbuf)
1080  return ERR(ENOMEM);
1081 
1082  rs->dmsg = calloc(rs->rq_size + 1, sizeof(*rs->dmsg));
1083  if (!rs->dmsg)
1084  return ERR(ENOMEM);
1085 
1086  rs->sqe_avail = rs->sq_size;
1087  rs->rqe_avail = rs->rq_size;
1088 
1089  rs->smsg_free = (struct ds_smsg *)rs->sbuf;
1090  msg = rs->smsg_free;
1091  for (i = 0; i < rs->sq_size - 1; i++) {
1092  msg->next = (void *)msg + RS_SNDLOWAT;
1093  msg = msg->next;
1094  }
1095  msg->next = NULL;
1096 
1097  ret = rs_notify_svc(&udp_svc, rs, RS_SVC_ADD_DGRAM);
1098  if (ret)
1099  return ret;
1100 
1101  rs->state = rs_readable | rs_writable;
1102  return 0;
1103 }
1104 
1105 int rsocket(int domain, int type, int protocol)
1106 {
1107  struct rsocket *rs;
1108  int index, ret;
1109 
1110  if ((domain != AF_INET && domain != AF_INET6 && domain != AF_IB) ||
1111  ((type != SOCK_STREAM) && (type != SOCK_DGRAM)) ||
1112  (type == SOCK_STREAM && protocol && protocol != IPPROTO_TCP) ||
1113  (type == SOCK_DGRAM && protocol && protocol != IPPROTO_UDP))
1114  return ERR(ENOTSUP);
1115 
1116  rs_configure();
1117  rs = rs_alloc(NULL, type);
1118  if (!rs)
1119  return ERR(ENOMEM);
1120 
1121  if (type == SOCK_STREAM) {
1122  ret = rdma_create_id(NULL, &rs->cm_id, rs, RDMA_PS_TCP);
1123  if (ret)
1124  goto err;
1125 
1126  rs->cm_id->route.addr.src_addr.sa_family = domain;
1127  index = rs->cm_id->channel->fd;
1128  } else {
1129  ret = ds_init(rs, domain);
1130  if (ret)
1131  goto err;
1132 
1133  index = rs->udp_sock;
1134  }
1135 
1136  ret = rs_insert(rs, index);
1137  if (ret < 0)
1138  goto err;
1139 
1140  return rs->index;
1141 
1142 err:
1143  rs_free(rs);
1144  return ret;
1145 }
1146 
1147 int rbind(int socket, const struct sockaddr *addr, socklen_t addrlen)
1148 {
1149  struct rsocket *rs;
1150  int ret;
1151 
1152  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
1153  if (!rs)
1154  return ERR(EBADF);
1155  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) {
1156  ret = rdma_bind_addr(rs->cm_id, (struct sockaddr *)addr);
1157  if (!ret)
1158  rs->state = rs_bound;
1159  } else {
1160  if (rs->state == rs_init) {
1161  ret = ds_init_ep(rs);
1162  if (ret)
1163  return ret;
1164  }
1165  ret = bind(rs->udp_sock, addr, addrlen);
1166  }
1167  return ret;
1168 }
1169 
1170 int rlisten(int socket, int backlog)
1171 {
1172  struct rsocket *rs;
1173  int ret;
1174 
1175  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
1176  if (!rs)
1177  return ERR(EBADF);
1178 
1179  if (rs->state != rs_listening) {
1180  ret = rdma_listen(rs->cm_id, backlog);
1181  if (!ret)
1182  rs->state = rs_listening;
1183  } else {
1184  ret = 0;
1185  }
1186  return ret;
1187 }
1188 
1189 /*
1190  * Nonblocking is usually not inherited between sockets, but we need to
1191  * inherit it here to establish the connection only. This is needed to
1192  * prevent rdma_accept from blocking until the remote side finishes
1193  * establishing the connection. If we were to allow rdma_accept to block,
1194  * then a single thread cannot establish a connection with itself, or
1195  * two threads which try to connect to each other can deadlock trying to
1196  * form a connection.
1197  *
1198  * Data transfers on the new socket remain blocking unless the user
1199  * specifies otherwise through rfcntl.
1200  */
1201 int raccept(int socket, struct sockaddr *addr, socklen_t *addrlen)
1202 {
1203  struct rsocket *rs, *new_rs;
1204  struct rdma_conn_param param;
1205  struct rs_conn_data *creq, cresp;
1206  int ret;
1207 
1208  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
1209  if (!rs)
1210  return ERR(EBADF);
1211  new_rs = rs_alloc(rs, rs->type);
1212  if (!new_rs)
1213  return ERR(ENOMEM);
1214 
1215  ret = rdma_get_request(rs->cm_id, &new_rs->cm_id);
1216  if (ret)
1217  goto err;
1218 
1219  ret = rs_insert(new_rs, new_rs->cm_id->channel->fd);
1220  if (ret < 0)
1221  goto err;
1222 
1223  creq = (struct rs_conn_data *)(new_rs->cm_id->event->param.conn
1224  .private_data +
1225  rs_conn_data_offset(rs));
1226  if (creq->version != 1) {
1227  ret = ERR(ENOTSUP);
1228  goto err;
1229  }
1230 
1231  if (rs->fd_flags & O_NONBLOCK)
1232  fcntl(new_rs->cm_id->channel->fd, F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK);
1233 
1234  ret = rs_create_ep(new_rs);
1235  if (ret)
1236  goto err;
1237 
1238  rs_save_conn_data(new_rs, creq);
1239  param = new_rs->cm_id->event->param.conn;
1240  rs_format_conn_data(new_rs, &cresp);
1241  param.private_data = &cresp;
1242  param.private_data_len = sizeof cresp;
1243  ret = rdma_accept(new_rs->cm_id, &param);
1244  if (!ret)
1245  new_rs->state = rs_connect_rdwr;
1246  else if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EWOULDBLOCK)
1247  new_rs->state = rs_accepting;
1248  else
1249  goto err;
1250 
1251  if (addr && addrlen)
1252  rgetpeername(new_rs->index, addr, addrlen);
1253  return new_rs->index;
1254 
1255 err:
1256  rs_free(new_rs);
1257  return ret;
1258 }
1259 
1260 static int rs_do_connect(struct rsocket *rs)
1261 {
1262  struct rdma_conn_param param;
1263  struct rs_conn_private_data cdata;
1264  struct rs_conn_data *creq, *cresp;
1265  int to, ret;
1266 
1267  switch (rs->state) {
1268  case rs_init:
1269  case rs_bound:
1270  resolve_addr:
1271  to = 1000 << rs->retries++;
1272  ret = rdma_resolve_addr(rs->cm_id, NULL,
1273  &rs->cm_id->route.addr.dst_addr, to);
1274  if (!ret)
1275  goto resolve_route;
1276  if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EWOULDBLOCK)
1277  rs->state = rs_resolving_addr;
1278  break;
1279  case rs_resolving_addr:
1280  ret = ucma_complete(rs->cm_id);
1281  if (ret) {
1282  if (errno == ETIMEDOUT &&
1283  rs->retries <= RS_CONN_RETRIES)
1284  goto resolve_addr;
1285  break;
1286  }
1287 
1288  rs->retries = 0;
1289  resolve_route:
1290  to = 1000 << rs->retries++;
1291  if (rs->optval) {
1292  ret = rdma_set_option(rs->cm_id, RDMA_OPTION_IB,
1293  RDMA_OPTION_IB_PATH, rs->optval,
1294  rs->optlen);
1295  free(rs->optval);
1296  rs->optval = NULL;
1297  if (!ret) {
1298  rs->state = rs_resolving_route;
1299  goto resolving_route;
1300  }
1301  } else {
1302  ret = rdma_resolve_route(rs->cm_id, to);
1303  if (!ret)
1304  goto do_connect;
1305  }
1306  if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EWOULDBLOCK)
1307  rs->state = rs_resolving_route;
1308  break;
1309  case rs_resolving_route:
1310  resolving_route:
1311  ret = ucma_complete(rs->cm_id);
1312  if (ret) {
1313  if (errno == ETIMEDOUT &&
1314  rs->retries <= RS_CONN_RETRIES)
1315  goto resolve_route;
1316  break;
1317  }
1318  do_connect:
1319  ret = rs_create_ep(rs);
1320  if (ret)
1321  break;
1322 
1323  memset(&param, 0, sizeof param);
1324  creq = (void *)&cdata + rs_conn_data_offset(rs);
1325  rs_format_conn_data(rs, creq);
1326  param.private_data = (void *)creq - rs_conn_data_offset(rs);
1327  param.private_data_len =
1328  sizeof(*creq) + rs_conn_data_offset(rs);
1329  param.flow_control = 1;
1330  param.retry_count = 7;
1331  param.rnr_retry_count = 7;
1332  /* work-around: iWarp issues RDMA read during connection */
1333  if (rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)
1334  param.initiator_depth = 1;
1335  rs->retries = 0;
1336 
1337  ret = rdma_connect(rs->cm_id, &param);
1338  if (!ret)
1339  goto connected;
1340  if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EWOULDBLOCK)
1341  rs->state = rs_connecting;
1342  break;
1343  case rs_connecting:
1344  ret = ucma_complete(rs->cm_id);
1345  if (ret)
1346  break;
1347  connected:
1348  cresp = (struct rs_conn_data *)
1349  rs->cm_id->event->param.conn.private_data;
1350  if (cresp->version != 1) {
1351  ret = ERR(ENOTSUP);
1352  break;
1353  }
1354 
1355  rs_save_conn_data(rs, cresp);
1356  rs->state = rs_connect_rdwr;
1357  break;
1358  case rs_accepting:
1359  if (!(rs->fd_flags & O_NONBLOCK))
1360  fcntl(rs->cm_id->channel->fd, F_SETFL, 0);
1361 
1362  ret = ucma_complete(rs->cm_id);
1363  if (ret)
1364  break;
1365 
1366  rs->state = rs_connect_rdwr;
1367  break;
1368  default:
1369  ret = ERR(EINVAL);
1370  break;
1371  }
1372 
1373  if (ret) {
1374  if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EWOULDBLOCK) {
1375  errno = EINPROGRESS;
1376  } else {
1377  rs->state = rs_connect_error;
1378  rs->err = errno;
1379  }
1380  }
1381  return ret;
1382 }
1383 
1384 static int rs_any_addr(const union socket_addr *addr)
1385 {
1386  if (addr->sa.sa_family == AF_INET) {
1387  return (addr->sin.sin_addr.s_addr == INADDR_ANY ||
1388  addr->sin.sin_addr.s_addr == INADDR_LOOPBACK);
1389  } else {
1390  return (!memcmp(&addr->sin6.sin6_addr, &in6addr_any, 16) ||
1391  !memcmp(&addr->sin6.sin6_addr, &in6addr_loopback, 16));
1392  }
1393 }
1394 
1395 static int ds_get_src_addr(struct rsocket *rs, const struct sockaddr *dest_addr,
1396  socklen_t dest_len, union socket_addr *src_addr,
1397  socklen_t *src_len)
1398 {
1399  int sock, ret;
1400  uint16_t port;
1401 
1402  *src_len = sizeof *src_addr;
1403  ret = getsockname(rs->udp_sock, &src_addr->sa, src_len);
1404  if (ret || !rs_any_addr(src_addr))
1405  return ret;
1406 
1407  port = src_addr->sin.sin_port;
1408  sock = socket(dest_addr->sa_family, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
1409  if (sock < 0)
1410  return sock;
1411 
1412  ret = connect(sock, dest_addr, dest_len);
1413  if (ret)
1414  goto out;
1415 
1416  *src_len = sizeof *src_addr;
1417  ret = getsockname(sock, &src_addr->sa, src_len);
1418  src_addr->sin.sin_port = port;
1419 out:
1420  close(sock);
1421  return ret;
1422 }
1423 
1424 static void ds_format_hdr(struct ds_header *hdr, union socket_addr *addr)
1425 {
1426  if (addr->sa.sa_family == AF_INET) {
1427  hdr->version = 4;
1428  hdr->length = DS_IPV4_HDR_LEN;
1429  hdr->port = addr->sin.sin_port;
1430  hdr->addr.ipv4 = addr->sin.sin_addr.s_addr;
1431  } else {
1432  hdr->version = 6;
1433  hdr->length = DS_IPV6_HDR_LEN;
1434  hdr->port = addr->sin6.sin6_port;
1435  hdr->addr.ipv6.flowinfo = addr->sin6.sin6_flowinfo;
1436  memcpy(&hdr->addr.ipv6.addr, &addr->sin6.sin6_addr, 16);
1437  }
1438 }
1439 
1440 static int ds_add_qp_dest(struct ds_qp *qp, union socket_addr *addr,
1441  socklen_t addrlen)
1442 {
1443  struct ibv_port_attr port_attr;
1444  struct ibv_ah_attr attr;
1445  int ret;
1446 
1447  memcpy(&qp->dest.addr, addr, addrlen);
1448  qp->dest.qp = qp;
1449  qp->dest.qpn = qp->cm_id->qp->qp_num;
1450 
1451  ret = ibv_query_port(qp->cm_id->verbs, qp->cm_id->port_num, &port_attr);
1452  if (ret)
1453  return ret;
1454 
1455  memset(&attr, 0, sizeof attr);
1456  attr.dlid = port_attr.lid;
1457  attr.port_num = qp->cm_id->port_num;
1458  qp->dest.ah = ibv_create_ah(qp->cm_id->pd, &attr);
1459  if (!qp->dest.ah)
1460  return ERR(ENOMEM);
1461 
1462  tsearch(&qp->dest.addr, &qp->rs->dest_map, ds_compare_addr);
1463  return 0;
1464 }
1465 
1466 static int ds_create_qp(struct rsocket *rs, union socket_addr *src_addr,
1467  socklen_t addrlen, struct ds_qp **new_qp)
1468 {
1469  struct ds_qp *qp;
1470  struct ibv_qp_init_attr qp_attr;
1471  struct epoll_event event;
1472  int i, ret;
1473 
1474  qp = calloc(1, sizeof(*qp));
1475  if (!qp)
1476  return ERR(ENOMEM);
1477 
1478  qp->rs = rs;
1479  ret = rdma_create_id(NULL, &qp->cm_id, qp, RDMA_PS_UDP);
1480  if (ret)
1481  goto err;
1482 
1483  ds_format_hdr(&qp->hdr, src_addr);
1484  ret = rdma_bind_addr(qp->cm_id, &src_addr->sa);
1485  if (ret)
1486  goto err;
1487 
1488  ret = ds_init_bufs(qp);
1489  if (ret)
1490  goto err;
1491 
1492  ret = rs_create_cq(rs, qp->cm_id);
1493  if (ret)
1494  goto err;
1495 
1496  memset(&qp_attr, 0, sizeof qp_attr);
1497  qp_attr.qp_context = qp;
1498  qp_attr.send_cq = qp->cm_id->send_cq;
1499  qp_attr.recv_cq = qp->cm_id->recv_cq;
1500  qp_attr.qp_type = IBV_QPT_UD;
1501  qp_attr.sq_sig_all = 1;
1502  qp_attr.cap.max_send_wr = rs->sq_size;
1503  qp_attr.cap.max_recv_wr = rs->rq_size;
1504  qp_attr.cap.max_send_sge = 1;
1505  qp_attr.cap.max_recv_sge = 2;
1506  qp_attr.cap.max_inline_data = rs->sq_inline;
1507  ret = rdma_create_qp(qp->cm_id, NULL, &qp_attr);
1508  if (ret)
1509  goto err;
1510 
1511  rs->sq_inline = qp_attr.cap.max_inline_data;
1512  ret = ds_add_qp_dest(qp, src_addr, addrlen);
1513  if (ret)
1514  goto err;
1515 
1516  event.events = EPOLLIN;
1517  event.data.ptr = qp;
1518  ret = epoll_ctl(rs->epfd, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, qp->cm_id->recv_cq_channel->fd,
1519  &event);
1520  if (ret)
1521  goto err;
1522 
1523  for (i = 0; i < rs->rq_size; i++) {
1524  ret = ds_post_recv(rs, qp, i * RS_SNDLOWAT);
1525  if (ret)
1526  goto err;
1527  }
1528 
1529  ds_insert_qp(rs, qp);
1530  *new_qp = qp;
1531  return 0;
1532 err:
1533  ds_free_qp(qp);
1534  return ret;
1535 }
1536 
1537 static int ds_get_qp(struct rsocket *rs, union socket_addr *src_addr,
1538  socklen_t addrlen, struct ds_qp **qp)
1539 {
1540  if (rs->qp_list) {
1541  *qp = rs->qp_list;
1542  do {
1543  if (!ds_compare_addr(rdma_get_local_addr((*qp)->cm_id),
1544  src_addr))
1545  return 0;
1546 
1547  *qp = ds_next_qp(*qp);
1548  } while (*qp != rs->qp_list);
1549  }
1550 
1551  return ds_create_qp(rs, src_addr, addrlen, qp);
1552 }
1553 
1554 static int ds_get_dest(struct rsocket *rs, const struct sockaddr *addr,
1555  socklen_t addrlen, struct ds_dest **dest)
1556 {
1557  union socket_addr src_addr;
1558  socklen_t src_len;
1559  struct ds_qp *qp;
1560  struct ds_dest **tdest, *new_dest;
1561  int ret = 0;
1562 
1563  fastlock_acquire(&rs->map_lock);
1564  tdest = tfind(addr, &rs->dest_map, ds_compare_addr);
1565  if (tdest)
1566  goto found;
1567 
1568  ret = ds_get_src_addr(rs, addr, addrlen, &src_addr, &src_len);
1569  if (ret)
1570  goto out;
1571 
1572  ret = ds_get_qp(rs, &src_addr, src_len, &qp);
1573  if (ret)
1574  goto out;
1575 
1576  tdest = tfind(addr, &rs->dest_map, ds_compare_addr);
1577  if (!tdest) {
1578  new_dest = calloc(1, sizeof(*new_dest));
1579  if (!new_dest) {
1580  ret = ERR(ENOMEM);
1581  goto out;
1582  }
1583 
1584  memcpy(&new_dest->addr, addr, addrlen);
1585  new_dest->qp = qp;
1586  tdest = tsearch(&new_dest->addr, &rs->dest_map,
1587  ds_compare_addr);
1588  }
1589 
1590 found:
1591  *dest = *tdest;
1592 out:
1593  fastlock_release(&rs->map_lock);
1594  return ret;
1595 }
1596 
1597 int rconnect(int socket, const struct sockaddr *addr, socklen_t addrlen)
1598 {
1599  struct rsocket *rs;
1600  int ret;
1601 
1602  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
1603  if (!rs)
1604  return ERR(EBADF);
1605  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) {
1606  memcpy(&rs->cm_id->route.addr.dst_addr, addr, addrlen);
1607  ret = rs_do_connect(rs);
1608  } else {
1609  if (rs->state == rs_init) {
1610  ret = ds_init_ep(rs);
1611  if (ret)
1612  return ret;
1613  }
1614 
1615  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
1616  ret = connect(rs->udp_sock, addr, addrlen);
1617  if (!ret)
1618  ret = ds_get_dest(rs, addr, addrlen, &rs->conn_dest);
1619  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
1620  }
1621  return ret;
1622 }
1623 
1624 static void *rs_get_ctrl_buf(struct rsocket *rs)
1625 {
1626  return rs->sbuf + rs->sbuf_size +
1627  RS_MAX_CTRL_MSG * (rs->ctrl_seqno & (RS_QP_CTRL_SIZE - 1));
1628 }
1629 
1630 static int rs_post_msg(struct rsocket *rs, uint32_t msg)
1631 {
1632  struct ibv_send_wr wr, *bad;
1633  struct ibv_sge sge;
1634 
1635  wr.wr_id = rs_send_wr_id(msg);
1636  wr.next = NULL;
1637  if (!(rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)) {
1638  wr.sg_list = NULL;
1639  wr.num_sge = 0;
1640  wr.opcode = IBV_WR_RDMA_WRITE_WITH_IMM;
1641  wr.send_flags = 0;
1642  wr.imm_data = htonl(msg);
1643  } else {
1644  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)&msg;
1645  sge.lkey = 0;
1646  sge.length = sizeof msg;
1647  wr.sg_list = &sge;
1648  wr.num_sge = 1;
1649  wr.opcode = IBV_WR_SEND;
1650  wr.send_flags = IBV_SEND_INLINE;
1651  }
1652 
1653  return rdma_seterrno(ibv_post_send(rs->cm_id->qp, &wr, &bad));
1654 }
1655 
1656 static int rs_post_write(struct rsocket *rs, struct ibv_sge *sgl, int nsge,
1657  uint32_t wr_data, int flags, uint64_t addr,
1658  uint32_t rkey)
1659 {
1660  struct ibv_send_wr wr, *bad;
1661 
1662  wr.wr_id = rs_send_wr_id(wr_data);
1663  wr.next = NULL;
1664  wr.sg_list = sgl;
1665  wr.num_sge = nsge;
1666  wr.opcode = IBV_WR_RDMA_WRITE;
1667  wr.send_flags = flags;
1668  wr.wr.rdma.remote_addr = addr;
1669  wr.wr.rdma.rkey = rkey;
1670 
1671  return rdma_seterrno(ibv_post_send(rs->cm_id->qp, &wr, &bad));
1672 }
1673 
1674 static int rs_post_write_msg(struct rsocket *rs, struct ibv_sge *sgl, int nsge,
1675  uint32_t msg, int flags, uint64_t addr,
1676  uint32_t rkey)
1677 {
1678  struct ibv_send_wr wr, *bad;
1679  struct ibv_sge sge;
1680  int ret;
1681 
1682  wr.next = NULL;
1683  if (!(rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)) {
1684  wr.wr_id = rs_send_wr_id(msg);
1685  wr.sg_list = sgl;
1686  wr.num_sge = nsge;
1687  wr.opcode = IBV_WR_RDMA_WRITE_WITH_IMM;
1688  wr.send_flags = flags;
1689  wr.imm_data = htonl(msg);
1690  wr.wr.rdma.remote_addr = addr;
1691  wr.wr.rdma.rkey = rkey;
1692 
1693  return rdma_seterrno(ibv_post_send(rs->cm_id->qp, &wr, &bad));
1694  } else {
1695  ret = rs_post_write(rs, sgl, nsge, msg, flags, addr, rkey);
1696  if (!ret) {
1697  wr.wr_id =
1698  rs_send_wr_id(rs_msg_set(rs_msg_op(msg), 0)) |
1699  RS_WR_ID_FLAG_MSG_SEND;
1700  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)&msg;
1701  sge.lkey = 0;
1702  sge.length = sizeof msg;
1703  wr.sg_list = &sge;
1704  wr.num_sge = 1;
1705  wr.opcode = IBV_WR_SEND;
1706  wr.send_flags = IBV_SEND_INLINE;
1707 
1708  ret = rdma_seterrno(
1709  ibv_post_send(rs->cm_id->qp, &wr, &bad));
1710  }
1711  return ret;
1712  }
1713 }
1714 
1715 static int ds_post_send(struct rsocket *rs, struct ibv_sge *sge,
1716  uint32_t wr_data)
1717 {
1718  struct ibv_send_wr wr, *bad;
1719 
1720  wr.wr_id = rs_send_wr_id(wr_data);
1721  wr.next = NULL;
1722  wr.sg_list = sge;
1723  wr.num_sge = 1;
1724  wr.opcode = IBV_WR_SEND;
1725  wr.send_flags = (sge->length <= rs->sq_inline) ? IBV_SEND_INLINE : 0;
1726  wr.wr.ud.ah = rs->conn_dest->ah;
1727  wr.wr.ud.remote_qpn = rs->conn_dest->qpn;
1728  wr.wr.ud.remote_qkey = RDMA_UDP_QKEY;
1729 
1730  return rdma_seterrno(
1731  ibv_post_send(rs->conn_dest->qp->cm_id->qp, &wr, &bad));
1732 }
1733 
1734 /*
1735  * Update target SGE before sending data. Otherwise the remote side may
1736  * update the entry before we do.
1737  */
1738 static int rs_write_data(struct rsocket *rs, struct ibv_sge *sgl, int nsge,
1739  uint32_t length, int flags)
1740 {
1741  uint64_t addr;
1742  uint32_t rkey;
1743 
1744  rs->sseq_no++;
1745  rs->sqe_avail--;
1746  if (rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)
1747  rs->sqe_avail--;
1748  rs->sbuf_bytes_avail -= length;
1749 
1750  addr = rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].addr;
1751  rkey = rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].key;
1752 
1753  rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].addr += length;
1754  rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].length -= length;
1755 
1756  if (!rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].length) {
1757  if (++rs->target_sge == RS_SGL_SIZE)
1758  rs->target_sge = 0;
1759  }
1760 
1761  return rs_post_write_msg(rs, sgl, nsge, rs_msg_set(RS_OP_DATA, length),
1762  flags, addr, rkey);
1763 }
1764 
1765 static int rs_write_direct(struct rsocket *rs, struct rs_iomap *iom,
1766  uint64_t offset, struct ibv_sge *sgl, int nsge,
1767  uint32_t length, int flags)
1768 {
1769  uint64_t addr;
1770 
1771  rs->sqe_avail--;
1772  rs->sbuf_bytes_avail -= length;
1773 
1774  addr = iom->sge.addr + offset - iom->offset;
1775  return rs_post_write(rs, sgl, nsge, rs_msg_set(RS_OP_WRITE, length),
1776  flags, addr, iom->sge.key);
1777 }
1778 
1779 static int rs_write_iomap(struct rsocket *rs, struct rs_iomap_mr *iomr,
1780  struct ibv_sge *sgl, int nsge, int flags)
1781 {
1782  uint64_t addr;
1783 
1784  rs->sseq_no++;
1785  rs->sqe_avail--;
1786  if (rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)
1787  rs->sqe_avail--;
1788  rs->sbuf_bytes_avail -= sizeof(struct rs_iomap);
1789 
1790  addr = rs->remote_iomap.addr + iomr->index * sizeof(struct rs_iomap);
1791  return rs_post_write_msg(rs, sgl, nsge,
1792  rs_msg_set(RS_OP_IOMAP_SGL, iomr->index),
1793  flags, addr, rs->remote_iomap.key);
1794 }
1795 
1796 static uint32_t rs_sbuf_left(struct rsocket *rs)
1797 {
1798  return (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)(uintptr_t)&rs->sbuf[rs->sbuf_size]) -
1799  rs->ssgl[0].addr);
1800 }
1801 
1802 static void rs_send_credits(struct rsocket *rs)
1803 {
1804  struct ibv_sge ibsge;
1805  struct rs_sge sge, *sge_buf;
1806  int flags;
1807 
1808  rs->ctrl_seqno++;
1809  rs->rseq_comp = rs->rseq_no + (rs->rq_size >> 1);
1810  if (rs->rbuf_bytes_avail >= (rs->rbuf_size >> 1)) {
1811  if (rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)
1812  rs->ctrl_seqno++;
1813 
1814  if (!(rs->opts & RS_OPT_SWAP_SGL)) {
1815  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)&rs->rbuf[rs->rbuf_free_offset];
1816  sge.key = rs->rmr->rkey;
1817  sge.length = rs->rbuf_size >> 1;
1818  } else {
1819  sge.addr = bswap_64(
1820  (uintptr_t)&rs->rbuf[rs->rbuf_free_offset]);
1821  sge.key = bswap_32(rs->rmr->rkey);
1822  sge.length = bswap_32(rs->rbuf_size >> 1);
1823  }
1824 
1825  if (rs->sq_inline < sizeof sge) {
1826  sge_buf = rs_get_ctrl_buf(rs);
1827  memcpy(sge_buf, &sge, sizeof sge);
1828  ibsge.addr = (uintptr_t)sge_buf;
1829  ibsge.lkey = rs->smr->lkey;
1830  flags = 0;
1831  } else {
1832  ibsge.addr = (uintptr_t)&sge;
1833  ibsge.lkey = 0;
1834  flags = IBV_SEND_INLINE;
1835  }
1836  ibsge.length = sizeof(sge);
1837 
1838  rs_post_write_msg(
1839  rs, &ibsge, 1,
1840  rs_msg_set(RS_OP_SGL, rs->rseq_no + rs->rq_size), flags,
1841  rs->remote_sgl.addr +
1842  rs->remote_sge * sizeof(struct rs_sge),
1843  rs->remote_sgl.key);
1844 
1845  rs->rbuf_bytes_avail -= rs->rbuf_size >> 1;
1846  rs->rbuf_free_offset += rs->rbuf_size >> 1;
1847  if (rs->rbuf_free_offset >= rs->rbuf_size)
1848  rs->rbuf_free_offset = 0;
1849  if (++rs->remote_sge == rs->remote_sgl.length)
1850  rs->remote_sge = 0;
1851  } else {
1852  rs_post_msg(rs,
1853  rs_msg_set(RS_OP_SGL, rs->rseq_no + rs->rq_size));
1854  }
1855 }
1856 
1857 static inline int rs_ctrl_avail(struct rsocket *rs)
1858 {
1859  return rs->ctrl_seqno != rs->ctrl_max_seqno;
1860 }
1861 
1862 /* Protocols that do not support RDMA write with immediate may require 2 msgs */
1863 static inline int rs_2ctrl_avail(struct rsocket *rs)
1864 {
1865  return (int)((rs->ctrl_seqno + 1) - rs->ctrl_max_seqno) < 0;
1866 }
1867 
1868 static int rs_give_credits(struct rsocket *rs)
1869 {
1870  if (!(rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)) {
1871  return ((rs->rbuf_bytes_avail >= (rs->rbuf_size >> 1)) ||
1872  ((short)((short)rs->rseq_no - (short)rs->rseq_comp) >=
1873  0)) &&
1874  rs_ctrl_avail(rs) && (rs->state & rs_connected);
1875  } else {
1876  return ((rs->rbuf_bytes_avail >= (rs->rbuf_size >> 1)) ||
1877  ((short)((short)rs->rseq_no - (short)rs->rseq_comp) >=
1878  0)) &&
1879  rs_2ctrl_avail(rs) && (rs->state & rs_connected);
1880  }
1881 }
1882 
1883 static void rs_update_credits(struct rsocket *rs)
1884 {
1885  if (rs_give_credits(rs))
1886  rs_send_credits(rs);
1887 }
1888 
1889 static int rs_poll_cq(struct rsocket *rs)
1890 {
1891  struct ibv_wc wc;
1892  uint32_t msg;
1893  int ret, rcnt = 0;
1894 
1895  while ((ret = ibv_poll_cq(rs->cm_id->recv_cq, 1, &wc)) > 0) {
1896  if (rs_wr_is_recv(wc.wr_id)) {
1897  if (wc.status != IBV_WC_SUCCESS)
1898  continue;
1899  rcnt++;
1900 
1901  if (wc.wc_flags & IBV_WC_WITH_IMM) {
1902  msg = ntohl(wc.imm_data);
1903  } else {
1904  msg = ((uint32_t *)(rs->rbuf + rs->rbuf_size))
1905  [rs_wr_data(wc.wr_id)];
1906  }
1907  switch (rs_msg_op(msg)) {
1908  case RS_OP_SGL:
1909  rs->sseq_comp = (uint16_t)rs_msg_data(msg);
1910  break;
1911  case RS_OP_IOMAP_SGL:
1912  /* The iomap was updated, that's nice to know. */
1913  break;
1914  case RS_OP_CTRL:
1915  if (rs_msg_data(msg) == RS_CTRL_DISCONNECT) {
1916  rs->state = rs_disconnected;
1917  return 0;
1918  } else if (rs_msg_data(msg) ==
1919  RS_CTRL_SHUTDOWN) {
1920  if (rs->state & rs_writable) {
1921  rs->state &= ~rs_readable;
1922  } else {
1923  rs->state = rs_disconnected;
1924  return 0;
1925  }
1926  }
1927  break;
1928  case RS_OP_WRITE:
1929  /* We really shouldn't be here. */
1930  break;
1931  default:
1932  rs->rmsg[rs->rmsg_tail].op = rs_msg_op(msg);
1933  rs->rmsg[rs->rmsg_tail].data = rs_msg_data(msg);
1934  if (++rs->rmsg_tail == rs->rq_size + 1)
1935  rs->rmsg_tail = 0;
1936  break;
1937  }
1938  } else {
1939  switch (rs_msg_op(rs_wr_data(wc.wr_id))) {
1940  case RS_OP_SGL:
1941  rs->ctrl_max_seqno++;
1942  break;
1943  case RS_OP_CTRL:
1944  rs->ctrl_max_seqno++;
1945  if (rs_msg_data(rs_wr_data(wc.wr_id)) ==
1946  RS_CTRL_DISCONNECT)
1947  rs->state = rs_disconnected;
1948  break;
1949  case RS_OP_IOMAP_SGL:
1950  rs->sqe_avail++;
1951  if (!rs_wr_is_msg_send(wc.wr_id))
1952  rs->sbuf_bytes_avail +=
1953  sizeof(struct rs_iomap);
1954  break;
1955  default:
1956  rs->sqe_avail++;
1957  rs->sbuf_bytes_avail +=
1958  rs_msg_data(rs_wr_data(wc.wr_id));
1959  break;
1960  }
1961  if (wc.status != IBV_WC_SUCCESS &&
1962  (rs->state & rs_connected)) {
1963  rs->state = rs_error;
1964  rs->err = EIO;
1965  }
1966  }
1967  }
1968 
1969  if (rs->state & rs_connected) {
1970  while (!ret && rcnt--)
1971  ret = rs_post_recv(rs);
1972 
1973  if (ret) {
1974  rs->state = rs_error;
1975  rs->err = errno;
1976  }
1977  }
1978  return ret;
1979 }
1980 
1981 static int rs_get_cq_event(struct rsocket *rs)
1982 {
1983  struct ibv_cq *cq;
1984  void *context;
1985  int ret;
1986 
1987  if (!rs->cq_armed)
1988  return 0;
1989 
1990  ret = ibv_get_cq_event(rs->cm_id->recv_cq_channel, &cq, &context);
1991  if (!ret) {
1992  if (++rs->unack_cqe >= rs->sq_size + rs->rq_size) {
1993  ibv_ack_cq_events(rs->cm_id->recv_cq, rs->unack_cqe);
1994  rs->unack_cqe = 0;
1995  }
1996  rs->cq_armed = 0;
1997  } else if (!(errno == EAGAIN || errno == EINTR)) {
1998  rs->state = rs_error;
1999  }
2000 
2001  return ret;
2002 }
2003 
2004 /*
2005  * Although we serialize rsend and rrecv calls with respect to themselves,
2006  * both calls may run simultaneously and need to poll the CQ for completions.
2007  * We need to serialize access to the CQ, but rsend and rrecv need to
2008  * allow each other to make forward progress.
2009  *
2010  * For example, rsend may need to wait for credits from the remote side,
2011  * which could be stalled until the remote process calls rrecv. This should
2012  * not block rrecv from receiving data from the remote side however.
2013  *
2014  * We handle this by using two locks. The cq_lock protects against polling
2015  * the CQ and processing completions. The cq_wait_lock serializes access to
2016  * waiting on the CQ.
2017  */
2018 static int rs_process_cq(struct rsocket *rs, int nonblock,
2019  int (*test)(struct rsocket *rs))
2020 {
2021  int ret;
2022 
2023  fastlock_acquire(&rs->cq_lock);
2024  do {
2025  rs_update_credits(rs);
2026  ret = rs_poll_cq(rs);
2027  if (test(rs)) {
2028  ret = 0;
2029  break;
2030  } else if (ret) {
2031  break;
2032  } else if (nonblock) {
2033  ret = ERR(EWOULDBLOCK);
2034  } else if (!rs->cq_armed) {
2035  ibv_req_notify_cq(rs->cm_id->recv_cq, 0);
2036  rs->cq_armed = 1;
2037  } else {
2038  rs_update_credits(rs);
2039  fastlock_acquire(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
2040  fastlock_release(&rs->cq_lock);
2041 
2042  ret = rs_get_cq_event(rs);
2043  fastlock_release(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
2044  fastlock_acquire(&rs->cq_lock);
2045  }
2046  } while (!ret);
2047 
2048  rs_update_credits(rs);
2049  fastlock_release(&rs->cq_lock);
2050  return ret;
2051 }
2052 
2053 static int rs_get_comp(struct rsocket *rs, int nonblock,
2054  int (*test)(struct rsocket *rs))
2055 {
2056  struct timeval s, e;
2057  uint32_t poll_time = 0;
2058  int ret;
2059 
2060  do {
2061  ret = rs_process_cq(rs, 1, test);
2062  if (!ret || nonblock || errno != EWOULDBLOCK)
2063  return ret;
2064 
2065  if (!poll_time)
2066  gettimeofday(&s, NULL);
2067 
2068  gettimeofday(&e, NULL);
2069  poll_time = (e.tv_sec - s.tv_sec) * 1000000 +
2070  (e.tv_usec - s.tv_usec) + 1;
2071  } while (poll_time <= polling_time);
2072 
2073  ret = rs_process_cq(rs, 0, test);
2074  return ret;
2075 }
2076 
2077 static int ds_valid_recv(struct ds_qp *qp, struct ibv_wc *wc)
2078 {
2079  struct ds_header *hdr;
2080 
2081  hdr = (struct ds_header *)(qp->rbuf + rs_wr_data(wc->wr_id));
2082  return ((wc->byte_len >= sizeof(struct ibv_grh) + DS_IPV4_HDR_LEN) &&
2083  ((hdr->version == 4 && hdr->length == DS_IPV4_HDR_LEN) ||
2084  (hdr->version == 6 && hdr->length == DS_IPV6_HDR_LEN)));
2085 }
2086 
2087 /*
2088  * Poll all CQs associated with a datagram rsocket. We need to drop any
2089  * received messages that we do not have room to store. To limit drops,
2090  * we only poll if we have room to store the receive or we need a send
2091  * buffer. To ensure fairness, we poll the CQs round robin, remembering
2092  * where we left off.
2093  */
2094 static void ds_poll_cqs(struct rsocket *rs)
2095 {
2096  struct ds_qp *qp;
2097  struct ds_smsg *smsg;
2098  struct ds_rmsg *rmsg;
2099  struct ibv_wc wc;
2100  int ret, cnt;
2101 
2102  if (!(qp = rs->qp_list))
2103  return;
2104 
2105  do {
2106  cnt = 0;
2107  do {
2108  ret = ibv_poll_cq(qp->cm_id->recv_cq, 1, &wc);
2109  if (ret <= 0) {
2110  qp = ds_next_qp(qp);
2111  continue;
2112  }
2113 
2114  if (rs_wr_is_recv(wc.wr_id)) {
2115  if (rs->rqe_avail &&
2116  wc.status == IBV_WC_SUCCESS &&
2117  ds_valid_recv(qp, &wc)) {
2118  rs->rqe_avail--;
2119  rmsg = &rs->dmsg[rs->rmsg_tail];
2120  rmsg->qp = qp;
2121  rmsg->offset = rs_wr_data(wc.wr_id);
2122  rmsg->length = wc.byte_len -
2123  sizeof(struct ibv_grh);
2124  if (++rs->rmsg_tail == rs->rq_size + 1)
2125  rs->rmsg_tail = 0;
2126  } else {
2127  ds_post_recv(rs, qp,
2128  rs_wr_data(wc.wr_id));
2129  }
2130  } else {
2131  smsg = (struct ds_smsg *)(rs->sbuf +
2132  rs_wr_data(wc.wr_id));
2133  smsg->next = rs->smsg_free;
2134  rs->smsg_free = smsg;
2135  rs->sqe_avail++;
2136  }
2137 
2138  qp = ds_next_qp(qp);
2139  if (!rs->rqe_avail && rs->sqe_avail) {
2140  rs->qp_list = qp;
2141  return;
2142  }
2143  cnt++;
2144  } while (qp != rs->qp_list);
2145  } while (cnt);
2146 }
2147 
2148 static void ds_req_notify_cqs(struct rsocket *rs)
2149 {
2150  struct ds_qp *qp;
2151 
2152  if (!(qp = rs->qp_list))
2153  return;
2154 
2155  do {
2156  if (!qp->cq_armed) {
2157  ibv_req_notify_cq(qp->cm_id->recv_cq, 0);
2158  qp->cq_armed = 1;
2159  }
2160  qp = ds_next_qp(qp);
2161  } while (qp != rs->qp_list);
2162 }
2163 
2164 static int ds_get_cq_event(struct rsocket *rs)
2165 {
2166  struct epoll_event event;
2167  struct ds_qp *qp;
2168  struct ibv_cq *cq;
2169  void *context;
2170  int ret;
2171 
2172  if (!rs->cq_armed)
2173  return 0;
2174 
2175  ret = epoll_wait(rs->epfd, &event, 1, -1);
2176  if (ret <= 0)
2177  return ret;
2178 
2179  qp = event.data.ptr;
2180  ret = ibv_get_cq_event(qp->cm_id->recv_cq_channel, &cq, &context);
2181  if (!ret) {
2182  ibv_ack_cq_events(qp->cm_id->recv_cq, 1);
2183  qp->cq_armed = 0;
2184  rs->cq_armed = 0;
2185  }
2186 
2187  return ret;
2188 }
2189 
2190 static int ds_process_cqs(struct rsocket *rs, int nonblock,
2191  int (*test)(struct rsocket *rs))
2192 {
2193  int ret = 0;
2194 
2195  fastlock_acquire(&rs->cq_lock);
2196  do {
2197  ds_poll_cqs(rs);
2198  if (test(rs)) {
2199  ret = 0;
2200  break;
2201  } else if (nonblock) {
2202  ret = ERR(EWOULDBLOCK);
2203  } else if (!rs->cq_armed) {
2204  ds_req_notify_cqs(rs);
2205  rs->cq_armed = 1;
2206  } else {
2207  fastlock_acquire(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
2208  fastlock_release(&rs->cq_lock);
2209 
2210  ret = ds_get_cq_event(rs);
2211  fastlock_release(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
2212  fastlock_acquire(&rs->cq_lock);
2213  }
2214  } while (!ret);
2215 
2216  fastlock_release(&rs->cq_lock);
2217  return ret;
2218 }

2220 static int ds_get_comp(struct rsocket *rs, int nonblock,
2221  int (*test)(struct rsocket *rs))
2222 {

2224  uint32_t poll_time = 0;
2225  int ret;
2226 
2227  do {
2228  ret = ds_process_cqs(rs, 1, test);
2229  if (!ret || nonblock || errno != EWOULDBLOCK)
2230  return ret;
2231 
2232  if (!poll_time)
2233  gettimeofday(&s, NULL);
2234 
2235  gettimeofday(&e, NULL);
2236  poll_time = (e.tv_sec - s.tv_sec) * 1000000 +
2237  (e.tv_usec - s.tv_usec) + 1;
2238  } while (poll_time <= polling_time);
2239 
2240  ret = ds_process_cqs(rs, 0, test);
2241  return ret;
2242 }

2254 static int rs_poll_all(struct rsocket *rs)
2255 {
2256  return 1;
2257 }
2258 
2259 /*
2260  * We use hardware flow control to prevent over running the remote
2261  * receive queue. However, data transfers still require space in
2262  * the remote rmsg queue, or we risk losing notification that data
2263  * has been transfered.
2264  *
2265  * Be careful with race conditions in the check below. The target SGL
2266  * may be updated by a remote RDMA write.
2267  */
2268 static int rs_can_send(struct rsocket *rs)
2269 {
2270  if (!(rs->opts & RS_OPT_MSG_SEND)) {
2271  return rs->sqe_avail && (rs->sbuf_bytes_avail >= RS_SNDLOWAT) &&
2272  (rs->sseq_no != rs->sseq_comp) &&
2273  (rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].length != 0);
2274  } else {
2275  return (rs->sqe_avail >= 2) &&
2276  (rs->sbuf_bytes_avail >= RS_SNDLOWAT) &&
2277  (rs->sseq_no != rs->sseq_comp) &&
2278  (rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].length != 0);
2279  }
2280 }
2281 
2282 static int ds_can_send(struct rsocket *rs)
2283 {
2284  return rs->sqe_avail;
2285 }
2286 
2287 static int ds_all_sends_done(struct rsocket *rs)
2288 {
2289  return rs->sqe_avail == rs->sq_size;
2290 }
2291 
2292 static int rs_conn_can_send(struct rsocket *rs)
2293 {
2294  return rs_can_send(rs) || !(rs->state & rs_writable);
2295 }
2296 
2297 static int rs_conn_can_send_ctrl(struct rsocket *rs)
2298 {
2299  return rs_ctrl_avail(rs) || !(rs->state & rs_connected);
2300 }

2302 static int rs_have_rdata(struct rsocket *rs)
2303 {
2304  return (rs->rmsg_head != rs->rmsg_tail);
2305 }
2306 
2307 static int rs_conn_have_rdata(struct rsocket *rs)
2308 {
2309  return rs_have_rdata(rs) || !(rs->state & rs_readable);
2310 }

2312 static int rs_conn_all_sends_done(struct rsocket *rs)
2313 {
2314  return ((((int)rs->ctrl_max_seqno) - ((int)rs->ctrl_seqno)) +
2315  rs->sqe_avail ==
2316  rs->sq_size) ||
2317  !(rs->state & rs_connected);
2318 }

2320 static void ds_set_src(struct sockaddr *addr, socklen_t *addrlen,
2321  struct ds_header *hdr)
2322 {
2323  union socket_addr sa;
2324 
2325  memset(&sa, 0, sizeof sa);
2326  if (hdr->version == 4) {
2327  if (*addrlen > sizeof(sa.sin))
2328  *addrlen = sizeof(sa.sin);
2329 
2330  sa.sin.sin_family = AF_INET;
2331  sa.sin.sin_port = hdr->port;
2332  sa.sin.sin_addr.s_addr = hdr->addr.ipv4;
2333  } else {
2334  if (*addrlen > sizeof(sa.sin6))
2335  *addrlen = sizeof(sa.sin6);
2336 
2337  sa.sin6.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
2338  sa.sin6.sin6_port = hdr->port;
2339  sa.sin6.sin6_flowinfo = hdr->addr.ipv6.flowinfo;
2340  memcpy(&sa.sin6.sin6_addr, &hdr->addr.ipv6.addr, 16);
2341  }
2342  memcpy(addr, &sa, *addrlen);
2343 }

2345 static ssize_t ds_recvfrom(struct rsocket *rs, void *buf, size_t len, int flags,
2346  struct sockaddr *src_addr, socklen_t *addrlen)
2347 {
2348  struct ds_rmsg *rmsg;
2349  struct ds_header *hdr;
2350  int ret;
2351 
2352  if (!(rs->state & rs_readable))
2353  return ERR(EINVAL);
2354 
2355  if (!rs_have_rdata(rs)) {
2356  ret = ds_get_comp(rs, rs_nonblocking(rs, flags), rs_have_rdata);
2357  if (ret)
2358  return ret;
2359  }
2360 
2361  rmsg = &rs->dmsg[rs->rmsg_head];
2362  hdr = (struct ds_header *)(rmsg->qp->rbuf + rmsg->offset);
2363  if (len > rmsg->length - hdr->length)
2364  len = rmsg->length - hdr->length;
2365 
2366  memcpy(buf, (void *)hdr + hdr->length, len);
2367  if (addrlen)
2368  ds_set_src(src_addr, addrlen, hdr);
2369 
2370  if (!(flags & MSG_PEEK)) {
2371  ds_post_recv(rs, rmsg->qp, rmsg->offset);
2372  if (++rs->rmsg_head == rs->rq_size + 1)
2373  rs->rmsg_head = 0;
2374  rs->rqe_avail++;
2375  }
2376 
2377  return len;
2378 }
2379 
2380 static ssize_t rs_peek(struct rsocket *rs, void *buf, size_t len)
2381 {
2382  size_t left = len;
2383  uint32_t end_size, rsize;
2384  int rmsg_head, rbuf_offset;
2385 
2386  rmsg_head = rs->rmsg_head;
2387  rbuf_offset = rs->rbuf_offset;
2388 
2389  for (; left && (rmsg_head != rs->rmsg_tail); left -= rsize) {
2390  if (left < rs->rmsg[rmsg_head].data) {
2391  rsize = left;
2392  } else {
2393  rsize = rs->rmsg[rmsg_head].data;
2394  if (++rmsg_head == rs->rq_size + 1)
2395  rmsg_head = 0;
2396  }
2397 
2398  end_size = rs->rbuf_size - rbuf_offset;
2399  if (rsize > end_size) {
2400  memcpy(buf, &rs->rbuf[rbuf_offset], end_size);
2401  rbuf_offset = 0;
2402  buf += end_size;
2403  rsize -= end_size;
2404  left -= end_size;
2405  }
2406  memcpy(buf, &rs->rbuf[rbuf_offset], rsize);
2407  rbuf_offset += rsize;
2408  buf += rsize;
2409  }
2410 
2411  return len - left;
2412 }
2413 
2414 /*
2415  * Continue to receive any queued data even if the remote side has disconnected.
2416  */
2417 ssize_t rrecv(int socket, void *buf, size_t len, int flags)
2418 {
2419  struct rsocket *rs;
2420  size_t left = len;
2421  uint32_t end_size, rsize;
2422  int ret = 0;
2423 
2424  rs = idm_at(&idm, socket);
2425  if (rs->type == SOCK_DGRAM) {
2426  fastlock_acquire(&rs->rlock);
2427  ret = ds_recvfrom(rs, buf, len, flags, NULL, 0);
2428  fastlock_release(&rs->rlock);
2429  return ret;
2430  }
2431 
2432  if (rs->state & rs_opening) {
2433  ret = rs_do_connect(rs);
2434  if (ret) {
2435  if (errno == EINPROGRESS)
2436  errno = EAGAIN;
2437  return ret;
2438  }
2439  }
2440  fastlock_acquire(&rs->rlock);
2441  do {
2442  if (!rs_have_rdata(rs)) {
2443  ret = rs_get_comp(rs, rs_nonblocking(rs, flags),
2444  rs_conn_have_rdata);
2445  if (ret)
2446  break;
2447  }
2448 
2449  if (flags & MSG_PEEK) {
2450  left = len - rs_peek(rs, buf, left);
2451  break;
2452  }
2453 
2454  for (; left && rs_have_rdata(rs); left -= rsize) {
2455  if (left < rs->rmsg[rs->rmsg_head].data) {
2456  rsize = left;
2457  rs->rmsg[rs->rmsg_head].data -= left;
2458  } else {
2459  rs->rseq_no++;
2460  rsize = rs->rmsg[rs->rmsg_head].data;
2461  if (++rs->rmsg_head == rs->rq_size + 1)
2462  rs->rmsg_head = 0;
2463  }
2464 
2465  end_size = rs->rbuf_size - rs->rbuf_offset;
2466  if (rsize > end_size) {
2467  memcpy(buf, &rs->rbuf[rs->rbuf_offset],
2468  end_size);
2469  rs->rbuf_offset = 0;
2470  buf += end_size;
2471  rsize -= end_size;
2472  left -= end_size;
2473  rs->rbuf_bytes_avail += end_size;
2474  }
2475  memcpy(buf, &rs->rbuf[rs->rbuf_offset], rsize);
2476  rs->rbuf_offset += rsize;
2477  buf += rsize;
2478  rs->rbuf_bytes_avail += rsize;
2479  }
2480 
2481  } while (left && (flags & MSG_WAITALL) && (rs->state & rs_readable));
2482 
2483  fastlock_release(&rs->rlock);
2484  return (ret && left == len) ? ret : len - left;
2485 }
2486 
2487 ssize_t rrecvfrom(int socket, void *buf, size_t len, int flags,
2488  struct sockaddr *src_addr, socklen_t *addrlen)
2489 {
2490  struct rsocket *rs;
2491  int ret;
2492 
2493  rs = idm_at(&idm, socket);
2494  if (rs->type == SOCK_DGRAM) {
2495  fastlock_acquire(&rs->rlock);
2496  ret = ds_recvfrom(rs, buf, len, flags, src_addr, addrlen);
2497  fastlock_release(&rs->rlock);
2498  return ret;
2499  }
2500 
2501  ret = rrecv(socket, buf, len, flags);
2502  if (ret > 0 && src_addr)
2503  rgetpeername(socket, src_addr, addrlen);
2504 
2505  return ret;
2506 }

2532 ssize_t rreadv(int socket, const struct iovec *iov, int iovcnt)
2533 {
2534  return rrecvv(socket, iov, iovcnt, 0);
2535 }

2537 static int rs_send_iomaps(struct rsocket *rs, int flags)
2538 {
2539  struct rs_iomap_mr *iomr;
2540  struct ibv_sge sge;
2541  struct rs_iomap iom;
2542  int ret;
2543 
2544  fastlock_acquire(&rs->map_lock);
2545  while (!dlist_empty(&rs->iomap_queue)) {
2546  if (!rs_can_send(rs)) {
2547  ret = rs_get_comp(rs, rs_nonblocking(rs, flags),
2548  rs_conn_can_send);
2549  if (ret)
2550  break;
2551  if (!(rs->state & rs_writable)) {
2552  ret = ERR(ECONNRESET);
2553  break;
2554  }
2555  }
2556 
2557  iomr = container_of(rs->iomap_queue.next, struct rs_iomap_mr,
2558  entry);
2559  if (!(rs->opts & RS_OPT_SWAP_SGL)) {
2560  iom.offset = iomr->offset;
2561  iom.sge.addr = (uintptr_t)iomr->mr->addr;
2562  iom.sge.length = iomr->mr->length;
2563  iom.sge.key = iomr->mr->rkey;
2564  } else {
2565  iom.offset = bswap_64(iomr->offset);
2566  iom.sge.addr = bswap_64((uintptr_t)iomr->mr->addr);
2567  iom.sge.length = bswap_32(iomr->mr->length);
2568  iom.sge.key = bswap_32(iomr->mr->rkey);
2569  }
2570 
2571  if (rs->sq_inline >= sizeof iom) {
2572  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)&iom;
2573  sge.length = sizeof iom;
2574  sge.lkey = 0;
2575  ret = rs_write_iomap(rs, iomr, &sge, 1,
2576  IBV_SEND_INLINE);
2577  } else if (rs_sbuf_left(rs) >= sizeof iom) {
2578  memcpy((void *)(uintptr_t)rs->ssgl[0].addr, &iom,
2579  sizeof iom);
2580  rs->ssgl[0].length = sizeof iom;
2581  ret = rs_write_iomap(rs, iomr, rs->ssgl, 1, 0);
2582  if (rs_sbuf_left(rs) > sizeof iom)
2583  rs->ssgl[0].addr += sizeof iom;
2584  else
2585  rs->ssgl[0].addr = (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf;
2586  } else {
2587  rs->ssgl[0].length = rs_sbuf_left(rs);
2588  memcpy((void *)(uintptr_t)rs->ssgl[0].addr, &iom,
2589  rs->ssgl[0].length);
2590  rs->ssgl[1].length = sizeof iom - rs->ssgl[0].length;
2591  memcpy(rs->sbuf, ((void *)&iom) + rs->ssgl[0].length,
2592  rs->ssgl[1].length);
2593  ret = rs_write_iomap(rs, iomr, rs->ssgl, 2, 0);
2594  rs->ssgl[0].addr =
2595  (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf + rs->ssgl[1].length;
2596  }
2597  dlist_remove(&iomr->entry);
2598  dlist_insert_tail(&iomr->entry, &rs->iomap_list);
2599  if (ret)
2600  break;
2601  }
2602 
2603  rs->iomap_pending = !dlist_empty(&rs->iomap_queue);
2604  fastlock_release(&rs->map_lock);
2605  return ret;
2606 }

2608 static ssize_t ds_sendv_udp(struct rsocket *rs, const struct iovec *iov,
2609  int iovcnt, int flags, uint8_t op)
2610 {
2611  struct ds_udp_header hdr;
2612  struct msghdr msg;
2613  struct iovec miov[8];
2614  ssize_t ret;
2615 
2616  if (iovcnt > 8)
2617  return ERR(ENOTSUP);
2618 
2619  hdr.tag = htonl(DS_UDP_TAG);
2620  hdr.version = rs->conn_dest->qp->hdr.version;
2621  hdr.op = op;
2622  hdr.reserved = 0;
2623  hdr.qpn = htonl(rs->conn_dest->qp->cm_id->qp->qp_num & 0xFFFFFF);
2624  if (rs->conn_dest->qp->hdr.version == 4) {
2625  hdr.length = DS_UDP_IPV4_HDR_LEN;
2626  hdr.addr.ipv4 = rs->conn_dest->qp->hdr.addr.ipv4;
2627  } else {
2628  hdr.length = DS_UDP_IPV6_HDR_LEN;
2629  memcpy(hdr.addr.ipv6, &rs->conn_dest->qp->hdr.addr.ipv6, 16);
2630  }
2631 
2632  miov[0].iov_base = &hdr;
2633  miov[0].iov_len = hdr.length;
2634  if (iov && iovcnt)
2635  memcpy(&miov[1], iov, sizeof *iov * iovcnt);
2636 
2637  memset(&msg, 0, sizeof msg);
2638  msg.msg_name = &rs->conn_dest->addr;
2639  msg.msg_namelen = ucma_addrlen(&rs->conn_dest->addr.sa);
2640  msg.msg_iov = miov;
2641  msg.msg_iovlen = iovcnt + 1;
2642  ret = sendmsg(rs->udp_sock, &msg, flags);
2643  return ret > 0 ? ret - hdr.length : ret;
2644 }

2646 static ssize_t ds_send_udp(struct rsocket *rs, const void *buf, size_t len,
2647  int flags, uint8_t op)
2648 {
2649  struct iovec iov;
2650  if (buf && len) {
2651  iov.iov_base = (void *)buf;
2652  iov.iov_len = len;
2653  return ds_sendv_udp(rs, &iov, 1, flags, op);
2654  } else {
2655  return ds_sendv_udp(rs, NULL, 0, flags, op);
2656  }
2657 }

2659 static ssize_t dsend(struct rsocket *rs, const void *buf, size_t len, int flags)
2660 {
2661  struct ds_smsg *msg;
2662  struct ibv_sge sge;
2663  uint64_t offset;
2664  int ret = 0;
2665 
2666  if (!rs->conn_dest->ah)
2667  return ds_send_udp(rs, buf, len, flags, RS_OP_DATA);
2668 
2669  if (!ds_can_send(rs)) {
2670  ret = ds_get_comp(rs, rs_nonblocking(rs, flags), ds_can_send);
2671  if (ret)
2672  return ret;
2673  }
2674 
2675  msg = rs->smsg_free;
2676  rs->smsg_free = msg->next;
2677  rs->sqe_avail--;
2678 
2679  memcpy((void *)msg, &rs->conn_dest->qp->hdr,
2680  rs->conn_dest->qp->hdr.length);
2681  memcpy((void *)msg + rs->conn_dest->qp->hdr.length, buf, len);
2682  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)msg;
2683  sge.length = rs->conn_dest->qp->hdr.length + len;
2684  sge.lkey = rs->conn_dest->qp->smr->lkey;
2685  offset = (uint8_t *)msg - rs->sbuf;
2686 
2687  ret = ds_post_send(rs, &sge, offset);
2688  return ret ? ret : len;
2689 }
2690 
2691 /*
2692  * We overlap sending the data, by posting a small work request immediately,
2693  * then increasing the size of the send on each iteration.
2694  */
2695 ssize_t rsend(int socket, const void *buf, size_t len, int flags)
2696 {
2697  struct rsocket *rs;
2698  struct ibv_sge sge;
2699  size_t left = len;
2700  uint32_t xfer_size, olen = RS_OLAP_START_SIZE;
2701  int ret = 0;
2702 
2703  rs = idm_at(&idm, socket);
2704  if (rs->type == SOCK_DGRAM) {
2705  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
2706  ret = dsend(rs, buf, len, flags);
2707  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
2708  return ret;
2709  }
2710 
2711  if (rs->state & rs_opening) {
2712  ret = rs_do_connect(rs);
2713  if (ret) {
2714  if (errno == EINPROGRESS)
2715  errno = EAGAIN;
2716  return ret;
2717  }
2718  }
2719 
2720  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
2721  if (rs->iomap_pending) {
2722  ret = rs_send_iomaps(rs, flags);
2723  if (ret)
2724  goto out;
2725  }
2726  for (; left; left -= xfer_size, buf += xfer_size) {
2727  if (!rs_can_send(rs)) {
2728  ret = rs_get_comp(rs, rs_nonblocking(rs, flags),
2729  rs_conn_can_send);
2730  if (ret)
2731  break;
2732  if (!(rs->state & rs_writable)) {
2733  ret = ERR(ECONNRESET);
2734  break;
2735  }
2736  }
2737 
2738  if (olen < left) {
2739  xfer_size = olen;
2740  if (olen < RS_MAX_TRANSFER)
2741  olen <<= 1;
2742  } else {
2743  xfer_size = left;
2744  }
2745 
2746  if (xfer_size > rs->sbuf_bytes_avail)
2747  xfer_size = rs->sbuf_bytes_avail;
2748  if (xfer_size > rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].length)
2749  xfer_size = rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].length;
2750 
2751  if (xfer_size <= rs->sq_inline) {
2752  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)buf;
2753  sge.length = xfer_size;
2754  sge.lkey = 0;
2755  ret = rs_write_data(rs, &sge, 1, xfer_size,
2756  IBV_SEND_INLINE);
2757  } else if (xfer_size <= rs_sbuf_left(rs)) {
2758  memcpy((void *)(uintptr_t)rs->ssgl[0].addr, buf,
2759  xfer_size);
2760  rs->ssgl[0].length = xfer_size;
2761  ret = rs_write_data(rs, rs->ssgl, 1, xfer_size, 0);
2762  if (xfer_size < rs_sbuf_left(rs))
2763  rs->ssgl[0].addr += xfer_size;
2764  else
2765  rs->ssgl[0].addr = (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf;
2766  } else {
2767  rs->ssgl[0].length = rs_sbuf_left(rs);
2768  memcpy((void *)(uintptr_t)rs->ssgl[0].addr, buf,
2769  rs->ssgl[0].length);
2770  rs->ssgl[1].length = xfer_size - rs->ssgl[0].length;
2771  memcpy(rs->sbuf, buf + rs->ssgl[0].length,
2772  rs->ssgl[1].length);
2773  ret = rs_write_data(rs, rs->ssgl, 2, xfer_size, 0);
2774  rs->ssgl[0].addr =
2775  (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf + rs->ssgl[1].length;
2776  }
2777  if (ret)
2778  break;
2779  }
2780 out:
2781  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
2782 
2783  return (ret && left == len) ? ret : len - left;
2784 }
2785 
2786 ssize_t rsendto(int socket, const void *buf, size_t len, int flags,
2787  const struct sockaddr *dest_addr, socklen_t addrlen)
2788 {
2789  struct rsocket *rs;
2790  int ret;
2791 
2792  rs = idm_at(&idm, socket);
2793  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) {
2794  if (dest_addr || addrlen)
2795  return ERR(EISCONN);
2796 
2797  return rsend(socket, buf, len, flags);
2798  }
2799 
2800  if (rs->state == rs_init) {
2801  ret = ds_init_ep(rs);
2802  if (ret)
2803  return ret;
2804  }
2805 
2806  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
2807  if (!rs->conn_dest ||
2808  ds_compare_addr(dest_addr, &rs->conn_dest->addr)) {
2809  ret = ds_get_dest(rs, dest_addr, addrlen, &rs->conn_dest);
2810  if (ret)
2811  goto out;
2812  }
2813 
2814  ret = dsend(rs, buf, len, flags);
2815 out:
2816  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
2817  return ret;
2818 }

2820 static void rs_copy_iov(void *dst, const struct iovec **iov, size_t *offset,
2821  size_t len)
2822 {
2823  size_t size;
2824 
2825  while (len) {
2826  size = (*iov)->iov_len - *offset;
2827  if (size > len) {
2828  memcpy(dst, (*iov)->iov_base + *offset, len);
2829  *offset += len;
2830  break;
2831  }
2832 
2833  memcpy(dst, (*iov)->iov_base + *offset, size);
2834  len -= size;
2835  dst += size;
2836  (*iov)++;
2837  *offset = 0;
2838  }
2839 }

2841 static ssize_t rsendv(int socket, const struct iovec *iov, int iovcnt,
2842  int flags)
2843 {
2844  struct rsocket *rs;
2845  const struct iovec *cur_iov;
2846  size_t left, len, offset = 0;
2847  uint32_t xfer_size, olen = RS_OLAP_START_SIZE;
2848  int i, ret = 0;
2849 
2850  rs = idm_at(&idm, socket);
2851  if (rs->state & rs_opening) {
2852  ret = rs_do_connect(rs);
2853  if (ret) {
2854  if (errno == EINPROGRESS)
2855  errno = EAGAIN;
2856  return ret;
2857  }
2858  }
2859 
2860  cur_iov = iov;
2861  len = iov[0].iov_len;
2862  for (i = 1; i < iovcnt; i++)
2863  len += iov[i].iov_len;
2864  left = len;
2865 
2866  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
2867  if (rs->iomap_pending) {
2868  ret = rs_send_iomaps(rs, flags);
2869  if (ret)
2870  goto out;
2871  }
2872  for (; left; left -= xfer_size) {
2873  if (!rs_can_send(rs)) {
2874  ret = rs_get_comp(rs, rs_nonblocking(rs, flags),
2875  rs_conn_can_send);
2876  if (ret)
2877  break;
2878  if (!(rs->state & rs_writable)) {
2879  ret = ERR(ECONNRESET);
2880  break;
2881  }
2882  }
2883 
2884  if (olen < left) {
2885  xfer_size = olen;
2886  if (olen < RS_MAX_TRANSFER)
2887  olen <<= 1;
2888  } else {
2889  xfer_size = left;
2890  }
2891 
2892  if (xfer_size > rs->sbuf_bytes_avail)
2893  xfer_size = rs->sbuf_bytes_avail;
2894  if (xfer_size > rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].length)
2895  xfer_size = rs->target_sgl[rs->target_sge].length;
2896 
2897  if (xfer_size <= rs_sbuf_left(rs)) {
2898  rs_copy_iov((void *)(uintptr_t)rs->ssgl[0].addr,
2899  &cur_iov, &offset, xfer_size);
2900  rs->ssgl[0].length = xfer_size;
2901  ret = rs_write_data(rs, rs->ssgl, 1, xfer_size,
2902  xfer_size <= rs->sq_inline ?
2903  IBV_SEND_INLINE :
2904  0);
2905  if (xfer_size < rs_sbuf_left(rs))
2906  rs->ssgl[0].addr += xfer_size;
2907  else
2908  rs->ssgl[0].addr = (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf;
2909  } else {
2910  rs->ssgl[0].length = rs_sbuf_left(rs);
2911  rs_copy_iov((void *)(uintptr_t)rs->ssgl[0].addr,
2912  &cur_iov, &offset, rs->ssgl[0].length);
2913  rs->ssgl[1].length = xfer_size - rs->ssgl[0].length;
2914  rs_copy_iov(rs->sbuf, &cur_iov, &offset,
2915  rs->ssgl[1].length);
2916  ret = rs_write_data(rs, rs->ssgl, 2, xfer_size,
2917  xfer_size <= rs->sq_inline ?
2918  IBV_SEND_INLINE :
2919  0);
2920  rs->ssgl[0].addr =
2921  (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf + rs->ssgl[1].length;
2922  }
2923  if (ret)
2924  break;
2925  }
2926 out:
2927  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
2928 
2929  return (ret && left == len) ? ret : len - left;
2930 }

2950 static struct pollfd *rs_fds_alloc(nfds_t nfds)
2951 {
2952  static __thread struct pollfd *rfds;
2953  static __thread nfds_t rnfds;
2954 
2955  if (nfds > rnfds) {
2956  if (rfds)
2957  free(rfds);
2958 
2959  rfds = malloc(sizeof *rfds * nfds);
2960  rnfds = rfds ? nfds : 0;
2961  }
2962 
2963  return rfds;

2966 static int rs_poll_rs(struct rsocket *rs, int events, int nonblock,
2967  int (*test)(struct rsocket *rs))
2968 {
2969  struct pollfd fds;
2970  short revents;
2971  int ret;
2972 
2973 check_cq:
2974  if ((rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) &&
2975  ((rs->state & rs_connected) || (rs->state == rs_disconnected) ||
2976  (rs->state & rs_error))) {
2977  rs_process_cq(rs, nonblock, test);
2978 
2979  revents = 0;
2980  if ((events & POLLIN) && rs_conn_have_rdata(rs))
2981  revents |= POLLIN;
2982  if ((events & POLLOUT) && rs_can_send(rs))
2983  revents |= POLLOUT;
2984  if (!(rs->state & rs_connected)) {
2985  if (rs->state == rs_disconnected)
2986  revents |= POLLHUP;
2987  else
2988  revents |= POLLERR;
2989  }
2990 
2991  return revents;
2992  } else if (rs->type == SOCK_DGRAM) {
2993  ds_process_cqs(rs, nonblock, test);
2994 
2995  revents = 0;
2996  if ((events & POLLIN) && rs_have_rdata(rs))
2997  revents |= POLLIN;
2998  if ((events & POLLOUT) && ds_can_send(rs))
2999  revents |= POLLOUT;
3000 
3001  return revents;
3002  }
3003 
3004  if (rs->state == rs_listening) {
3005  fds.fd = rs->cm_id->channel->fd;
3006  fds.events = events;
3007  fds.revents = 0;
3008  poll(&fds, 1, 0);
3009  return fds.revents;
3010  }
3011 
3012  if (rs->state & rs_opening) {
3013  ret = rs_do_connect(rs);
3014  if (ret && (errno == EINPROGRESS)) {
3015  errno = 0;
3016  } else {
3017  goto check_cq;
3018  }
3019  }
3020 
3021  if (rs->state == rs_connect_error) {
3022  revents = 0;
3023  if (events & POLLOUT)
3024  revents |= POLLOUT;
3025  if (events & POLLIN)
3026  revents |= POLLIN;
3027  revents |= POLLERR;
3028  return revents;
3029  }
3030 
3031  return 0;
3032 }
3033 
3034 static int rs_poll_check(struct pollfd *fds, nfds_t nfds)
3035 {
3036  struct rsocket *rs;
3037  int i, cnt = 0;
3038 
3039  for (i = 0; i < nfds; i++) {
3040  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, fds[i].fd);
3041  if (rs)
3042  fds[i].revents =
3043  rs_poll_rs(rs, fds[i].events, 1, rs_poll_all);
3044  else
3045  poll(&fds[i], 1, 0);
3046 
3047  if (fds[i].revents)
3048  cnt++;
3049  }
3050  return cnt;
3051 }
3052 
3053 static int rs_poll_arm(struct pollfd *rfds, struct pollfd *fds, nfds_t nfds)
3054 {
3055  struct rsocket *rs;
3056  int i;
3057 
3058  for (i = 0; i < nfds; i++) {
3059  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, fds[i].fd);
3060  if (rs) {
3061  fds[i].revents = rs_poll_rs(rs, fds[i].events, 0,
3062  rs_is_cq_armed);
3063  if (fds[i].revents)
3064  return 1;
3065 
3066  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) {
3067  if (rs->state >= rs_connected)
3068  rfds[i].fd =
3069  rs->cm_id->recv_cq_channel->fd;
3070  else
3071  rfds[i].fd = rs->cm_id->channel->fd;
3072  } else {
3073  rfds[i].fd = rs->epfd;
3074  }
3075  rfds[i].events = POLLIN;
3076  } else {
3077  rfds[i].fd = fds[i].fd;
3078  rfds[i].events = fds[i].events;
3079  }
3080  rfds[i].revents = 0;
3081  }
3082  return 0;
3083 }

3085 static int rs_poll_events(struct pollfd *rfds, struct pollfd *fds, nfds_t nfds)
3086 {
3087  struct rsocket *rs;
3088  int i, cnt = 0;
3089 
3090  for (i = 0; i < nfds; i++) {
3091  if (!rfds[i].revents)
3092  continue;
3093 
3094  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, fds[i].fd);
3095  if (rs) {
3096  fastlock_acquire(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
3097  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM)
3098  rs_get_cq_event(rs);
3099  else
3100  ds_get_cq_event(rs);
3101  fastlock_release(&rs->cq_wait_lock);
3102  fds[i].revents =
3103  rs_poll_rs(rs, fds[i].events, 1, rs_poll_all);
3104  } else {
3105  fds[i].revents = rfds[i].revents;
3106  }
3107  if (fds[i].revents)
3108  cnt++;
3109  }
3110  return cnt;
3111 }
3112 
3113 /*
3114  * We need to poll *all* fd's that the user specifies at least once.
3115  * Note that we may receive events on an rsocket that may not be reported
3116  * to the user (e.g. connection events or credit updates). Process those
3117  * events, then return to polling until we find ones of interest.
3118  */
3119 int rpoll(struct pollfd *fds, nfds_t nfds, int timeout)
3120 {
3121  struct timeval s, e;
3122  struct pollfd *rfds;
3123  uint32_t poll_time = 0;
3124  int ret;
3125 
3126  do {
3127  ret = rs_poll_check(fds, nfds);
3128  if (ret || !timeout)
3129  return ret;
3130 
3131  if (!poll_time)
3132  gettimeofday(&s, NULL);
3133 
3134  gettimeofday(&e, NULL);
3135  poll_time = (e.tv_sec - s.tv_sec) * 1000000 +
3136  (e.tv_usec - s.tv_usec) + 1;
3137  } while (poll_time <= polling_time);
3138 
3139  rfds = rs_fds_alloc(nfds);
3140  if (!rfds)
3141  return ERR(ENOMEM);
3142 
3143  do {
3144  ret = rs_poll_arm(rfds, fds, nfds);
3145  if (ret)
3146  break;
3147 
3148  ret = poll(rfds, nfds, timeout);
3149  if (ret <= 0)
3150  break;
3151 
3152  ret = rs_poll_events(rfds, fds, nfds);
3153  } while (!ret);
3154 
3155  return ret;
3156 }
3157 
3158 static struct pollfd *rs_select_to_poll(int *nfds, fd_set *readfds,
3159  fd_set *writefds, fd_set *exceptfds)
3160 {
3161  struct pollfd *fds;
3162  int fd, i = 0;
3163 
3164  fds = calloc(*nfds, sizeof *fds);
3165  if (!fds)
3166  return NULL;
3167 
3168  for (fd = 0; fd < *nfds; fd++) {
3169  if (readfds && FD_ISSET(fd, readfds)) {
3170  fds[i].fd = fd;
3171  fds[i].events = POLLIN;
3172  }
3173 
3174  if (writefds && FD_ISSET(fd, writefds)) {
3175  fds[i].fd = fd;
3176  fds[i].events |= POLLOUT;
3177  }
3178 
3179  if (exceptfds && FD_ISSET(fd, exceptfds))
3180  fds[i].fd = fd;
3181 
3182  if (fds[i].fd)
3183  i++;
3184  }
3185 
3186  *nfds = i;
3187  return fds;
3188 }
3189 
3190 static int rs_poll_to_select(int nfds, struct pollfd *fds, fd_set *readfds,
3191  fd_set *writefds, fd_set *exceptfds)
3192 {
3193  int i, cnt = 0;
3194 
3195  for (i = 0; i < nfds; i++) {
3196  if (readfds && (fds[i].revents & (POLLIN | POLLHUP))) {
3197  FD_SET(fds[i].fd, readfds);
3198  cnt++;
3199  }
3200 
3201  if (writefds && (fds[i].revents & POLLOUT)) {
3202  FD_SET(fds[i].fd, writefds);
3203  cnt++;
3204  }
3205 
3206  if (exceptfds && (fds[i].revents & ~(POLLIN | POLLOUT))) {
3207  FD_SET(fds[i].fd, exceptfds);
3208  cnt++;
3209  }
3210  }
3211  return cnt;
3212 }
3213 
3214 static int rs_convert_timeout(struct timeval *timeout)
3215 {
3216  return !timeout ? -1 : timeout->tv_sec * 1000 + timeout->tv_usec / 1000;
3217 }
3218 
3219 int rselect(int nfds, fd_set *readfds, fd_set *writefds, fd_set *exceptfds,
3220  struct timeval *timeout)
3221 {
3222  struct pollfd *fds;
3223  int ret;
3224 
3225  fds = rs_select_to_poll(&nfds, readfds, writefds, exceptfds);
3226  if (!fds)
3227  return ERR(ENOMEM);
3228 
3229  ret = rpoll(fds, nfds, rs_convert_timeout(timeout));
3230 
3231  if (readfds)
3232  FD_ZERO(readfds);
3233  if (writefds)
3234  FD_ZERO(writefds);
3235  if (exceptfds)
3236  FD_ZERO(exceptfds);
3237 
3238  if (ret > 0)
3239  ret = rs_poll_to_select(nfds, fds, readfds, writefds,
3240  exceptfds);
3241 
3242  free(fds);
3243  return ret;
3244 }

3246 /*
3247  * For graceful disconnect, notify the remote side that we're
3248  * disconnecting and wait until all outstanding sends complete, provided
3249  * that the remote side has not sent a disconnect message.
3250  */
3251 int rshutdown(int socket, int how)
3252 {
3253  struct rsocket *rs;
3254  int ctrl, ret = 0;
3255 
3256  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
3257  if (!rs)
3258  return ERR(EBADF);
3259  if (rs->opts & RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE)
3260  rs_notify_svc(&tcp_svc, rs, RS_SVC_REM_KEEPALIVE);
3261 
3262  if (rs->fd_flags & O_NONBLOCK)
3263  rs_set_nonblocking(rs, 0);
3264 
3265  if (rs->state & rs_connected) {
3266  if (how == SHUT_RDWR) {
3267  ctrl = RS_CTRL_DISCONNECT;
3268  rs->state &= ~(rs_readable | rs_writable);
3269  } else if (how == SHUT_WR) {
3270  rs->state &= ~rs_writable;
3271  ctrl = (rs->state & rs_readable) ? RS_CTRL_SHUTDOWN :
3272  RS_CTRL_DISCONNECT;
3273  } else {
3274  rs->state &= ~rs_readable;
3275  if (rs->state & rs_writable)
3276  goto out;
3277  ctrl = RS_CTRL_DISCONNECT;
3278  }
3279  if (!rs_ctrl_avail(rs)) {
3280  ret = rs_process_cq(rs, 0, rs_conn_can_send_ctrl);
3281  if (ret)
3282  goto out;
3283  }
3284 
3285  if ((rs->state & rs_connected) && rs_ctrl_avail(rs)) {
3286  rs->ctrl_seqno++;
3287  ret = rs_post_msg(rs, rs_msg_set(RS_OP_CTRL, ctrl));
3288  }
3289  }
3290 
3291  if (rs->state & rs_connected)
3292  rs_process_cq(rs, 0, rs_conn_all_sends_done);
3293 
3294 out:
3295  if ((rs->fd_flags & O_NONBLOCK) && (rs->state & rs_connected))
3296  rs_set_nonblocking(rs, rs->fd_flags);
3297 
3298  if (rs->state & rs_disconnected) {
3299  /* Generate event by flushing receives to unblock rpoll */
3300  ibv_req_notify_cq(rs->cm_id->recv_cq, 0);
3301  ucma_shutdown(rs->cm_id);
3302  }
3303 
3304  return ret;
3305 }
3306 
3307 static void ds_shutdown(struct rsocket *rs)
3308 {
3309  if (rs->opts & RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE)
3310  rs_notify_svc(&udp_svc, rs, RS_SVC_REM_DGRAM);
3311 
3312  if (rs->fd_flags & O_NONBLOCK)
3313  rs_set_nonblocking(rs, 0);
3314 
3315  rs->state &= ~(rs_readable | rs_writable);
3316  ds_process_cqs(rs, 0, ds_all_sends_done);
3317 
3318  if (rs->fd_flags & O_NONBLOCK)
3319  rs_set_nonblocking(rs, rs->fd_flags);
3320 }
