3322 int rclose(int socket)
3323 {
3324  struct rsocket *rs;
3325 
3326  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
3327  if (!rs)
3328  return EBADF;
3329  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) {
3330  if (rs->state & rs_connected)
3331  rshutdown(socket, SHUT_RDWR);
3332  else if (rs->opts & RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE)
3333  rs_notify_svc(&tcp_svc, rs, RS_SVC_REM_KEEPALIVE);
3334  } else {
3335  ds_shutdown(rs);
3336  }
3337 
3338  rs_free(rs);
3339  return 0;
3340 }

3387 static int rs_set_keepalive(struct rsocket *rs, int on)
3388 {
3389  FILE *f;
3390  int ret;
3391 
3392  if ((on && (rs->opts & RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE)) ||
3393  (!on && !(rs->opts & RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE)))
3394  return 0;
3395 
3396  if (on) {
3397  if (!rs->keepalive_time) {
3398  if ((f = fopen("/proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_keepalive_time",
3399  "r"))) {
3400  (void)fscanf(f, "%u", &rs->keepalive_time);
3401  fclose(f);
3402  } else {
3403  rs->keepalive_time = 7200;
3404  }
3405  }
3406  ret = rs_notify_svc(&tcp_svc, rs, RS_SVC_ADD_KEEPALIVE);
3407  } else {
3408  ret = rs_notify_svc(&tcp_svc, rs, RS_SVC_REM_KEEPALIVE);
3409  }
3410 
3411  return ret;
3412 }

3414 int rsetsockopt(int socket, int level, int optname, const void *optval,
3415  socklen_t optlen)
3416 {
3417  struct rsocket *rs;
3418  int ret, opt_on = 0;
3419  uint64_t *opts = NULL;
3420 
3421  ret = ERR(ENOTSUP);
3422  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
3423  if (!rs)
3424  return ERR(EBADF);
3425  if (rs->type == SOCK_DGRAM && level != SOL_RDMA) {
3426  ret = setsockopt(rs->udp_sock, level, optname, optval, optlen);
3427  if (ret)
3428  return ret;
3429  }
3430 
3431  switch (level) {
3432  case SOL_SOCKET:
3433  opts = &rs->so_opts;
3434  switch (optname) {
3435  case SO_REUSEADDR:
3436  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) {
3437  ret = rdma_set_option(rs->cm_id, RDMA_OPTION_ID,
3438  RDMA_OPTION_ID_REUSEADDR,
3439  (void *)optval, optlen);
3440  if (ret &&
3441  ((errno == ENOSYS) ||
3442  ((rs->state != rs_init) &&
3443  rs->cm_id->context &&
3444  (rs->cm_id->verbs->device->transport_type ==
3445  IBV_TRANSPORT_IB))))
3446  ret = 0;
3447  }
3448  opt_on = *(int *)optval;
3449  break;
3450  case SO_RCVBUF:
3451  if ((rs->type == SOCK_STREAM && !rs->rbuf) ||
3452  (rs->type == SOCK_DGRAM && !rs->qp_list))
3453  rs->rbuf_size = (*(uint32_t *)optval) << 1;
3454  ret = 0;
3455  break;
3456  case SO_SNDBUF:
3457  if (!rs->sbuf)
3458  rs->sbuf_size = (*(uint32_t *)optval) << 1;
3459  if (rs->sbuf_size < RS_SNDLOWAT)
3460  rs->sbuf_size = RS_SNDLOWAT << 1;
3461  ret = 0;
3462  break;
3463  case SO_LINGER:
3464  /* Invert value so default so_opt = 0 is on */
3465  opt_on = !((struct linger *)optval)->l_onoff;
3466  ret = 0;
3467  break;
3468  case SO_KEEPALIVE:
3469  ret = rs_set_keepalive(rs, *(int *)optval);
3470  opt_on = rs->opts & RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE;
3471  break;
3472  case SO_OOBINLINE:
3473  opt_on = *(int *)optval;
3474  ret = 0;
3475  break;
3476  default:
3477  break;
3478  }
3479  break;
3480  case IPPROTO_TCP:
3481  opts = &rs->tcp_opts;
3482  switch (optname) {
3483  case TCP_KEEPCNT:
3484  case TCP_KEEPINTVL:
3485  ret = 0; /* N/A - we're using a reliable connection */
3486  break;
3487  case TCP_KEEPIDLE:
3488  if (*(int *)optval <= 0) {
3489  ret = ERR(EINVAL);
3490  break;
3491  }
3492  rs->keepalive_time = *(int *)optval;
3493  ret = (rs->opts & RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE) ?
3494  rs_notify_svc(&tcp_svc, rs,
3495  RS_SVC_MOD_KEEPALIVE) :
3496  0;
3497  break;
3498  case TCP_NODELAY:
3499  opt_on = *(int *)optval;
3500  ret = 0;
3501  break;
3502  case TCP_MAXSEG:
3503  ret = 0;
3504  break;
3505  default:
3506  break;
3507  }
3508  break;
3509  case IPPROTO_IPV6:
3510  opts = &rs->ipv6_opts;
3511  switch (optname) {
3512  case IPV6_V6ONLY:
3513  if (rs->type == SOCK_STREAM) {
3514  ret = rdma_set_option(rs->cm_id, RDMA_OPTION_ID,
3515  RDMA_OPTION_ID_AFONLY,
3516  (void *)optval, optlen);
3517  }
3518  opt_on = *(int *)optval;
3519  break;
3520  default:
3521  break;
3522  }
3523  break;
3524  case SOL_RDMA:
3525  if (rs->state >= rs_opening) {
3526  ret = ERR(EINVAL);
3527  break;
3528  }
3529 
3530  switch (optname) {
3531  case RDMA_SQSIZE:
3532  rs->sq_size =
3533  min((*(uint32_t *)optval), RS_QP_MAX_SIZE);
3534  ret = 0;
3535  break;
3536  case RDMA_RQSIZE:
3537  rs->rq_size =
3538  min((*(uint32_t *)optval), RS_QP_MAX_SIZE);
3539  ret = 0;
3540  break;
3541  case RDMA_INLINE:
3542  rs->sq_inline =
3543  min(*(uint32_t *)optval, RS_QP_MAX_SIZE);
3544  ret = 0;
3545  break;
3546  case RDMA_IOMAPSIZE:
3547  rs->target_iomap_size = (uint16_t)rs_scale_to_value(
3548  (uint8_t)rs_value_to_scale(*(int *)optval, 8),
3549  8);
3550  ret = 0;
3551  break;
3552  case RDMA_ROUTE:
3553  if ((rs->optval = malloc(optlen))) {
3554  memcpy(rs->optval, optval, optlen);
3555  rs->optlen = optlen;
3556  ret = 0;
3557  } else {
3558  ret = ERR(ENOMEM);
3559  }
3560  break;
3561  default:
3562  break;
3563  }
3564  break;
3565  default:
3566  break;
3567  }
3568 
3569  if (!ret && opts) {
3570  if (opt_on)
3571  *opts |= (1 << optname);
3572  else
3573  *opts &= ~(1 << optname);
3574  }
3575 
3576  return ret;
3577 }
3578 
3579 static void rs_convert_sa_path(struct ibv_sa_path_rec *sa_path,
3580  struct ibv_path_data *path_data)
3581 {
3582  uint32_t fl_hop;
3583 
3584  memset(path_data, 0, sizeof(*path_data));
3585  path_data->path.dgid = sa_path->dgid;
3586  path_data->path.sgid = sa_path->sgid;
3587  path_data->path.dlid = sa_path->dlid;
3588  path_data->path.slid = sa_path->slid;
3589  fl_hop = ntohl(sa_path->flow_label) << 8;
3590  path_data->path.flowlabel_hoplimit = htonl(fl_hop) | sa_path->hop_limit;
3591  path_data->path.tclass = sa_path->traffic_class;
3592  path_data->path.reversible_numpath = sa_path->reversible << 7 | 1;
3593  path_data->path.pkey = sa_path->pkey;
3594  path_data->path.qosclass_sl = sa_path->sl;
3595  path_data->path.mtu = sa_path->mtu | 2 << 6; /* exactly */
3596  path_data->path.rate = sa_path->rate | 2 << 6;
3597  path_data->path.packetlifetime = sa_path->packet_life_time | 2 << 6;
3598  path_data->flags = sa_path->preference;
3599 }
3600 
3601 int rgetsockopt(int socket, int level, int optname, void *optval,
3602  socklen_t *optlen)
3603 {
3604  struct rsocket *rs;
3605  void *opt;
3606  struct ibv_sa_path_rec *path_rec;
3607  struct ibv_path_data path_data;
3608  socklen_t len;
3609  int ret = 0;
3610  int num_paths;
3611 
3612  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
3613  if (!rs)
3614  return ERR(EBADF);
3615  switch (level) {
3616  case SOL_SOCKET:
3617  switch (optname) {
3618  case SO_REUSEADDR:
3619  case SO_KEEPALIVE:
3620  case SO_OOBINLINE:
3621  *((int *)optval) = !!(rs->so_opts & (1 << optname));
3622  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3623  break;
3624  case SO_RCVBUF:
3625  *((int *)optval) = rs->rbuf_size;
3626  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3627  break;
3628  case SO_SNDBUF:
3629  *((int *)optval) = rs->sbuf_size;
3630  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3631  break;
3632  case SO_LINGER:
3633  /* Value is inverted so default so_opt = 0 is on */
3634  ((struct linger *)optval)->l_onoff =
3635  !(rs->so_opts & (1 << optname));
3636  ((struct linger *)optval)->l_linger = 0;
3637  *optlen = sizeof(struct linger);
3638  break;
3639  case SO_ERROR:
3640  *((int *)optval) = rs->err;
3641  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3642  rs->err = 0;
3643  break;
3644  default:
3645  ret = ENOTSUP;
3646  break;
3647  }
3648  break;
3649  case IPPROTO_TCP:
3650  switch (optname) {
3651  case TCP_KEEPCNT:
3652  case TCP_KEEPINTVL:
3653  *((int *)optval) = 1; /* N/A */
3654  break;
3655  case TCP_KEEPIDLE:
3656  *((int *)optval) = (int)rs->keepalive_time;
3657  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3658  break;
3659  case TCP_NODELAY:
3660  *((int *)optval) = !!(rs->tcp_opts & (1 << optname));
3661  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3662  break;
3663  case TCP_MAXSEG:
3664  *((int *)optval) =
3665  (rs->cm_id && rs->cm_id->route.num_paths) ?
3666  1 << (7 +
3667  rs->cm_id->route.path_rec->mtu) :
3668  2048;
3669  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3670  break;
3671  default:
3672  ret = ENOTSUP;
3673  break;
3674  }
3675  break;
3676  case IPPROTO_IPV6:
3677  switch (optname) {
3678  case IPV6_V6ONLY:
3679  *((int *)optval) = !!(rs->ipv6_opts & (1 << optname));
3680  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3681  break;
3682  default:
3683  ret = ENOTSUP;
3684  break;
3685  }
3686  break;
3687  case SOL_RDMA:
3688  switch (optname) {
3689  case RDMA_SQSIZE:
3690  *((int *)optval) = rs->sq_size;
3691  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3692  break;
3693  case RDMA_RQSIZE:
3694  *((int *)optval) = rs->rq_size;
3695  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3696  break;
3697  case RDMA_INLINE:
3698  *((int *)optval) = rs->sq_inline;
3699  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3700  break;
3701  case RDMA_IOMAPSIZE:
3702  *((int *)optval) = rs->target_iomap_size;
3703  *optlen = sizeof(int);
3704  break;
3705  case RDMA_ROUTE:
3706  if (rs->optval) {
3707  if (*optlen < rs->optlen) {
3708  ret = EINVAL;
3709  } else {
3710  memcpy(rs->optval, optval, rs->optlen);
3711  *optlen = rs->optlen;
3712  }
3713  } else {
3714  if (*optlen < sizeof(path_data)) {
3715  ret = EINVAL;
3716  } else {
3717  len = 0;
3718  opt = optval;
3719  path_rec = rs->cm_id->route.path_rec;
3720  num_paths = 0;
3721  while (len + sizeof(path_data) <=
3722  *optlen &&
3723  num_paths < rs->cm_id->route
3724  .num_paths) {
3725  rs_convert_sa_path(path_rec,
3726  &path_data);
3727  memcpy(opt, &path_data,
3728  sizeof(path_data));
3729  len += sizeof(path_data);
3730  opt += sizeof(path_data);
3731  path_rec++;
3732  num_paths++;
3733  }
3734  *optlen = len;
3735  ret = 0;
3736  }
3737  }
3738  break;
3739  default:
3740  ret = ENOTSUP;
3741  break;
3742  }
3743  break;
3744  default:
3745  ret = ENOTSUP;
3746  break;
3747  }
3748 
3749  return rdma_seterrno(ret);
3750 }
3751 
3752 int rfcntl(int socket, int cmd, ... /* arg */)
3753 {
3754  struct rsocket *rs;
3755  va_list args;
3756  int param;
3757  int ret = 0;
3758 
3759  rs = idm_lookup(&idm, socket);
3760  if (!rs)
3761  return ERR(EBADF);
3762  va_start(args, cmd);
3763  switch (cmd) {
3764  case F_GETFL:
3765  ret = rs->fd_flags;
3766  break;
3767  case F_SETFL:
3768  param = va_arg(args, int);
3769  if ((rs->fd_flags & O_NONBLOCK) != (param & O_NONBLOCK))
3770  ret = rs_set_nonblocking(rs, param & O_NONBLOCK);
3771 
3772  if (!ret)
3773  rs->fd_flags = param;
3774  break;
3775  default:
3776  ret = ERR(ENOTSUP);
3777  break;
3778  }
3779  va_end(args);
3780  return ret;
3781 }
3782 
3783 static struct rs_iomap_mr *rs_get_iomap_mr(struct rsocket *rs)
3784 {
3785  int i;
3786 
3787  if (!rs->remote_iomappings) {
3788  rs->remote_iomappings = calloc(rs->remote_iomap.length,
3789  sizeof(*rs->remote_iomappings));
3790  if (!rs->remote_iomappings)
3791  return NULL;
3792 
3793  for (i = 0; i < rs->remote_iomap.length; i++)
3794  rs->remote_iomappings[i].index = i;
3795  }
3796 
3797  for (i = 0; i < rs->remote_iomap.length; i++) {
3798  if (!rs->remote_iomappings[i].mr)
3799  return &rs->remote_iomappings[i];
3800  }
3801  return NULL;
3802 }
3803 
3804 /*
3805  * If an offset is given, we map to it. If offset is -1, then we map the
3806  * offset to the address of buf. We do not check for conflicts, which must
3807  * be fixed at some point.
3808  */
3809 off_t riomap(int socket, void *buf, size_t len, int prot, int flags,
3810  off_t offset)
3811 {
3812  struct rsocket *rs;
3813  struct rs_iomap_mr *iomr;
3814  int access = IBV_ACCESS_LOCAL_WRITE;
3815 
3816  rs = idm_at(&idm, socket);
3817  if (!rs->cm_id->pd || (prot & ~(PROT_WRITE | PROT_NONE)))
3818  return ERR(EINVAL);
3819 
3820  fastlock_acquire(&rs->map_lock);
3821  if (prot & PROT_WRITE) {
3822  iomr = rs_get_iomap_mr(rs);
3823  access |= IBV_ACCESS_REMOTE_WRITE;
3824  } else {
3825  iomr = calloc(1, sizeof *iomr);
3826  iomr->index = -1;
3827  }
3828  if (!iomr) {
3829  offset = ERR(ENOMEM);
3830  goto out;
3831  }
3832 
3833  iomr->mr = ibv_reg_mr(rs->cm_id->pd, buf, len, access);
3834  if (!iomr->mr) {
3835  if (iomr->index < 0)
3836  free(iomr);
3837  offset = -1;
3838  goto out;
3839  }
3840 
3841  if (offset == -1)
3842  offset = (uintptr_t)buf;
3843  iomr->offset = offset;
3844  atomic_init(&iomr->refcnt);
3845  atomic_set(&iomr->refcnt, 1);
3846 
3847  if (iomr->index >= 0) {
3848  dlist_insert_tail(&iomr->entry, &rs->iomap_queue);
3849  rs->iomap_pending = 1;
3850  } else {
3851  dlist_insert_tail(&iomr->entry, &rs->iomap_list);
3852  }
3853 out:
3854  fastlock_release(&rs->map_lock);
3855  return offset;
3856 }
3857 
3858 int riounmap(int socket, void *buf, size_t len)
3859 {
3860  struct rsocket *rs;
3861  struct rs_iomap_mr *iomr;
3862  dlist_entry *entry;
3863  int ret = 0;
3864 
3865  rs = idm_at(&idm, socket);
3866  fastlock_acquire(&rs->map_lock);
3867 
3868  for (entry = rs->iomap_list.next; entry != &rs->iomap_list;
3869  entry = entry->next) {
3870  iomr = container_of(entry, struct rs_iomap_mr, entry);
3871  if (iomr->mr->addr == buf && iomr->mr->length == len) {
3872  rs_release_iomap_mr(iomr);
3873  goto out;
3874  }
3875  }
3876 
3877  for (entry = rs->iomap_queue.next; entry != &rs->iomap_queue;
3878  entry = entry->next) {
3879  iomr = container_of(entry, struct rs_iomap_mr, entry);
3880  if (iomr->mr->addr == buf && iomr->mr->length == len) {
3881  rs_release_iomap_mr(iomr);
3882  goto out;
3883  }
3884  }
3885  ret = ERR(EINVAL);
3886 out:
3887  fastlock_release(&rs->map_lock);
3888  return ret;
3889 }
3890 
3891 static struct rs_iomap *rs_find_iomap(struct rsocket *rs, off_t offset)
3892 {
3893  int i;
3894 
3895  for (i = 0; i < rs->target_iomap_size; i++) {
3896  if (offset >= rs->target_iomap[i].offset &&
3897  offset < rs->target_iomap[i].offset +
3898  rs->target_iomap[i].sge.length)
3899  return &rs->target_iomap[i];
3900  }
3901  return NULL;
3902 }
3903 
3904 size_t riowrite(int socket, const void *buf, size_t count, off_t offset,
3905  int flags)
3906 {
3907  struct rsocket *rs;
3908  struct rs_iomap *iom = NULL;
3909  struct ibv_sge sge;
3910  size_t left = count;
3911  uint32_t xfer_size, olen = RS_OLAP_START_SIZE;
3912  int ret = 0;
3913 
3914  rs = idm_at(&idm, socket);
3915  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
3916  if (rs->iomap_pending) {
3917  ret = rs_send_iomaps(rs, flags);
3918  if (ret)
3919  goto out;
3920  }
3921  for (; left; left -= xfer_size, buf += xfer_size, offset += xfer_size) {
3922  if (!iom || offset > iom->offset + iom->sge.length) {
3923  iom = rs_find_iomap(rs, offset);
3924  if (!iom)
3925  break;
3926  }
3927 
3928  if (!rs_can_send(rs)) {
3929  ret = rs_get_comp(rs, rs_nonblocking(rs, flags),
3930  rs_conn_can_send);
3931  if (ret)
3932  break;
3933  if (!(rs->state & rs_writable)) {
3934  ret = ERR(ECONNRESET);
3935  break;
3936  }
3937  }
3938 
3939  if (olen < left) {
3940  xfer_size = olen;
3941  if (olen < RS_MAX_TRANSFER)
3942  olen <<= 1;
3943  } else {
3944  xfer_size = left;
3945  }
3946 
3947  if (xfer_size > rs->sbuf_bytes_avail)
3948  xfer_size = rs->sbuf_bytes_avail;
3949  if (xfer_size > iom->offset + iom->sge.length - offset)
3950  xfer_size = iom->offset + iom->sge.length - offset;
3951 
3952  if (xfer_size <= rs->sq_inline) {
3953  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)buf;
3954  sge.length = xfer_size;
3955  sge.lkey = 0;
3956  ret = rs_write_direct(rs, iom, offset, &sge, 1,
3957  xfer_size, IBV_SEND_INLINE);
3958  } else if (xfer_size <= rs_sbuf_left(rs)) {
3959  memcpy((void *)(uintptr_t)rs->ssgl[0].addr, buf,
3960  xfer_size);
3961  rs->ssgl[0].length = xfer_size;
3962  ret = rs_write_direct(rs, iom, offset, rs->ssgl, 1,
3963  xfer_size, 0);
3964  if (xfer_size < rs_sbuf_left(rs))
3965  rs->ssgl[0].addr += xfer_size;
3966  else
3967  rs->ssgl[0].addr = (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf;
3968  } else {
3969  rs->ssgl[0].length = rs_sbuf_left(rs);
3970  memcpy((void *)(uintptr_t)rs->ssgl[0].addr, buf,
3971  rs->ssgl[0].length);
3972  rs->ssgl[1].length = xfer_size - rs->ssgl[0].length;
3973  memcpy(rs->sbuf, buf + rs->ssgl[0].length,
3974  rs->ssgl[1].length);
3975  ret = rs_write_direct(rs, iom, offset, rs->ssgl, 2,
3976  xfer_size, 0);
3977  rs->ssgl[0].addr =
3978  (uintptr_t)rs->sbuf + rs->ssgl[1].length;
3979  }
3980  if (ret)
3981  break;
3982  }
3983 out:
3984  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
3985 
3986  return (ret && left == count) ? ret : count - left;
3987 }

3989 /****************************************************************************
3990  * Service Processing Threads
3991  ****************************************************************************/

3993 static int rs_svc_grow_sets(struct rs_svc *svc, int grow_size)
3994 {
3995  struct rsocket **rss;
3996  void *set, *contexts;
3997 
3998  set = calloc(svc->size + grow_size, sizeof(*rss) + svc->context_size);
3999  if (!set)
4000  return ENOMEM;
4001 
4002  svc->size += grow_size;
4003  rss = set;
4004  contexts = set + sizeof(*rss) * svc->size;
4005  if (svc->cnt) {
4006  memcpy(rss, svc->rss, sizeof(*rss) * (svc->cnt + 1));
4007  memcpy(contexts, svc->contexts,
4008  svc->context_size * (svc->cnt + 1));
4009  }
4010 
4011  free(svc->rss);
4012  svc->rss = rss;
4013  svc->contexts = contexts;
4014  return 0;
4015 }
4016 
4017 /*
4018  * Index 0 is reserved for the service's communication socket.
4019  */
4020 static int rs_svc_add_rs(struct rs_svc *svc, struct rsocket *rs)
4021 {
4022  int ret;
4023 
4024  if (svc->cnt >= svc->size - 1) {
4025  ret = rs_svc_grow_sets(svc, 4);
4026  if (ret)
4027  return ret;
4028  }
4029 
4030  svc->rss[++svc->cnt] = rs;
4031  return 0;
4032 }
4033 
4034 static int rs_svc_index(struct rs_svc *svc, struct rsocket *rs)
4035 {
4036  int i;
4037 
4038  for (i = 1; i <= svc->cnt; i++) {
4039  if (svc->rss[i] == rs)
4040  return i;
4041  }
4042  return -1;
4043 }
4044 
4045 static int rs_svc_rm_rs(struct rs_svc *svc, struct rsocket *rs)
4046 {
4047  int i;
4048 
4049  if ((i = rs_svc_index(svc, rs)) >= 0) {
4050  svc->rss[i] = svc->rss[svc->cnt];
4051  memcpy(svc->contexts + i * svc->context_size,
4052  svc->contexts + svc->cnt * svc->context_size,
4053  svc->context_size);
4054  svc->cnt--;
4055  return 0;
4056  }
4057  return EBADF;
4058 }
4059 
4060 static void udp_svc_process_sock(struct rs_svc *svc)
4061 {
4062  struct rs_svc_msg msg;
4063 
4064  read(svc->sock[1], &msg, sizeof msg);
4065  switch (msg.cmd) {
4066  case RS_SVC_ADD_DGRAM:
4067  msg.status = rs_svc_add_rs(svc, msg.rs);
4068  if (!msg.status) {
4069  msg.rs->opts |= RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE;
4070  udp_svc_fds = svc->contexts;
4071  udp_svc_fds[svc->cnt].fd = msg.rs->udp_sock;
4072  udp_svc_fds[svc->cnt].events = POLLIN;
4073  udp_svc_fds[svc->cnt].revents = 0;
4074  }
4075  break;
4076  case RS_SVC_REM_DGRAM:
4077  msg.status = rs_svc_rm_rs(svc, msg.rs);
4078  if (!msg.status)
4079  msg.rs->opts &= ~RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE;
4080  break;
4081  case RS_SVC_NOOP:
4082  msg.status = 0;
4083  break;
4084  default:
4085  break;
4086  }
4087 
4088  write(svc->sock[1], &msg, sizeof msg);
4089 }
4090 
4091 static uint8_t udp_svc_sgid_index(struct ds_dest *dest, union ibv_gid *sgid)
4092 {
4093  union ibv_gid gid;
4094  int i;
4095 
4096  for (i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
4097  ibv_query_gid(dest->qp->cm_id->verbs, dest->qp->cm_id->port_num,
4098  i, &gid);
4099  if (!memcmp(sgid, &gid, sizeof gid))
4100  return i;
4101  }
4102  return 0;
4103 }
4104 
4105 static uint8_t udp_svc_path_bits(struct ds_dest *dest)
4106 {
4107  struct ibv_port_attr attr;
4108 
4109  if (!ibv_query_port(dest->qp->cm_id->verbs, dest->qp->cm_id->port_num,
4110  &attr))
4111  return (uint8_t)((1 << attr.lmc) - 1);
4112  return 0x7f;
4113 }
4114 
4115 static void udp_svc_create_ah(struct rsocket *rs, struct ds_dest *dest,
4116  uint32_t qpn)
4117 {
4118  union socket_addr saddr;
4119  struct rdma_cm_id *id;
4120  struct ibv_ah_attr attr;
4121  int ret;
4122 
4123  if (dest->ah) {
4124  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
4125  ibv_destroy_ah(dest->ah);
4126  dest->ah = NULL;
4127  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
4128  }
4129 
4130  ret = rdma_create_id(NULL, &id, NULL, dest->qp->cm_id->ps);
4131  if (ret)
4132  return;
4133 
4134  memcpy(&saddr, rdma_get_local_addr(dest->qp->cm_id),
4135  ucma_addrlen(rdma_get_local_addr(dest->qp->cm_id)));
4136  if (saddr.sa.sa_family == AF_INET)
4137  saddr.sin.sin_port = 0;
4138  else
4139  saddr.sin6.sin6_port = 0;
4140  ret = rdma_resolve_addr(id, &saddr.sa, &dest->addr.sa, 2000);
4141  if (ret)
4142  goto out;
4143 
4144  ret = rdma_resolve_route(id, 2000);
4145  if (ret)
4146  goto out;
4147 
4148  memset(&attr, 0, sizeof attr);
4149  if (id->route.path_rec->hop_limit > 1) {
4150  attr.is_global = 1;
4151  attr.grh.dgid = id->route.path_rec->dgid;
4152  attr.grh.flow_label = ntohl(id->route.path_rec->flow_label);
4153  attr.grh.sgid_index =
4154  udp_svc_sgid_index(dest, &id->route.path_rec->sgid);
4155  attr.grh.hop_limit = id->route.path_rec->hop_limit;
4156  attr.grh.traffic_class = id->route.path_rec->traffic_class;
4157  }
4158  attr.dlid = ntohs(id->route.path_rec->dlid);
4159  attr.sl = id->route.path_rec->sl;
4160  attr.src_path_bits = id->route.path_rec->slid & udp_svc_path_bits(dest);
4161  attr.static_rate = id->route.path_rec->rate;
4162  attr.port_num = id->port_num;
4163 
4164  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
4165  dest->qpn = qpn;
4166  dest->ah = ibv_create_ah(dest->qp->cm_id->pd, &attr);
4167  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
4168 out:
4169  rdma_destroy_id(id);
4170 }
4171 
4172 static int udp_svc_valid_udp_hdr(struct ds_udp_header *udp_hdr,
4173  union socket_addr *addr)
4174 {
4175  return (udp_hdr->tag == ntohl(DS_UDP_TAG)) &&
4176  ((udp_hdr->version == 4 && addr->sa.sa_family == AF_INET &&
4177  udp_hdr->length == DS_UDP_IPV4_HDR_LEN) ||
4178  (udp_hdr->version == 6 && addr->sa.sa_family == AF_INET6 &&
4179  udp_hdr->length == DS_UDP_IPV6_HDR_LEN));
4180 }
4181 
4182 static void udp_svc_forward(struct rsocket *rs, void *buf, size_t len,
4183  union socket_addr *src)
4184 {
4185  struct ds_header hdr;
4186  struct ds_smsg *msg;
4187  struct ibv_sge sge;
4188  uint64_t offset;
4189 
4190  if (!ds_can_send(rs)) {
4191  if (ds_get_comp(rs, 0, ds_can_send))
4192  return;
4193  }
4194 
4195  msg = rs->smsg_free;
4196  rs->smsg_free = msg->next;
4197  rs->sqe_avail--;
4198 
4199  ds_format_hdr(&hdr, src);
4200  memcpy((void *)msg, &hdr, hdr.length);
4201  memcpy((void *)msg + hdr.length, buf, len);
4202  sge.addr = (uintptr_t)msg;
4203  sge.length = hdr.length + len;
4204  sge.lkey = rs->conn_dest->qp->smr->lkey;
4205  offset = (uint8_t *)msg - rs->sbuf;
4206 
4207  ds_post_send(rs, &sge, offset);
4208 }
4209 
4210 static void udp_svc_process_rs(struct rsocket *rs)
4211 {
4212  static uint8_t buf[RS_SNDLOWAT];
4213  struct ds_dest *dest, *cur_dest;
4214  struct ds_udp_header *udp_hdr;
4215  union socket_addr addr;
4216  socklen_t addrlen = sizeof addr;
4217  int len, ret;
4218 
4219  ret = recvfrom(rs->udp_sock, buf, sizeof buf, 0, &addr.sa, &addrlen);
4220  if (ret < DS_UDP_IPV4_HDR_LEN)
4221  return;
4222 
4223  udp_hdr = (struct ds_udp_header *)buf;
4224  if (!udp_svc_valid_udp_hdr(udp_hdr, &addr))
4225  return;
4226 
4227  len = ret - udp_hdr->length;
4228  udp_hdr->tag = ntohl(udp_hdr->tag);
4229  udp_hdr->qpn = ntohl(udp_hdr->qpn) & 0xFFFFFF;
4230  ret = ds_get_dest(rs, &addr.sa, addrlen, &dest);
4231  if (ret)
4232  return;
4233 
4234  if (udp_hdr->op == RS_OP_DATA) {
4235  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
4236  cur_dest = rs->conn_dest;
4237  rs->conn_dest = dest;
4238  ds_send_udp(rs, NULL, 0, 0, RS_OP_CTRL);
4239  rs->conn_dest = cur_dest;
4240  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
4241  }
4242 
4243  if (!dest->ah || (dest->qpn != udp_hdr->qpn))
4244  udp_svc_create_ah(rs, dest, udp_hdr->qpn);
4245 
4246  /* to do: handle when dest local ip address doesn't match udp ip */
4247  if (udp_hdr->op == RS_OP_DATA) {
4248  fastlock_acquire(&rs->slock);
4249  cur_dest = rs->conn_dest;
4250  rs->conn_dest = &dest->qp->dest;
4251  udp_svc_forward(rs, buf + udp_hdr->length, len, &addr);
4252  rs->conn_dest = cur_dest;
4253  fastlock_release(&rs->slock);
4254  }
4255 }
4256 
4257 static void *udp_svc_run(void *arg)
4258 {
4259  struct rs_svc *svc = arg;
4260  struct rs_svc_msg msg;
4261  int i, ret;
4262 
4263  ret = rs_svc_grow_sets(svc, 4);
4264  if (ret) {
4265  msg.status = ret;
4266  write(svc->sock[1], &msg, sizeof msg);
4267  return (void *)(uintptr_t)ret;
4268  }
4269 
4270  udp_svc_fds = svc->contexts;
4271  udp_svc_fds[0].fd = svc->sock[1];
4272  udp_svc_fds[0].events = POLLIN;
4273  do {
4274  for (i = 0; i <= svc->cnt; i++)
4275  udp_svc_fds[i].revents = 0;
4276 
4277  poll(udp_svc_fds, svc->cnt + 1, -1);
4278  if (udp_svc_fds[0].revents)
4279  udp_svc_process_sock(svc);
4280 
4281  for (i = 1; i <= svc->cnt; i++) {
4282  if (udp_svc_fds[i].revents)
4283  udp_svc_process_rs(svc->rss[i]);
4284  }
4285  } while (svc->cnt >= 1);
4286 
4287  return NULL;
4288 }
4289 
4290 static uint32_t rs_get_time(void)
4291 {
4292  struct timeval now;
4293 
4294  memset(&now, 0, sizeof now);
4295  gettimeofday(&now, NULL);
4296  return (uint32_t)now.tv_sec;
4297 }
4298 
4299 static void tcp_svc_process_sock(struct rs_svc *svc)
4300 {
4301  struct rs_svc_msg msg;
4302  int i;
4303 
4304  read(svc->sock[1], &msg, sizeof msg);
4305  switch (msg.cmd) {
4306  case RS_SVC_ADD_KEEPALIVE:
4307  msg.status = rs_svc_add_rs(svc, msg.rs);
4308  if (!msg.status) {
4309  msg.rs->opts |= RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE;
4310  tcp_svc_timeouts = svc->contexts;
4311  tcp_svc_timeouts[svc->cnt] =
4312  rs_get_time() + msg.rs->keepalive_time;
4313  }
4314  break;
4315  case RS_SVC_REM_KEEPALIVE:
4316  msg.status = rs_svc_rm_rs(svc, msg.rs);
4317  if (!msg.status)
4318  msg.rs->opts &= ~RS_OPT_SVC_ACTIVE;
4319  break;
4320  case RS_SVC_MOD_KEEPALIVE:
4321  i = rs_svc_index(svc, msg.rs);
4322  if (i >= 0) {
4323  tcp_svc_timeouts[i] =
4324  rs_get_time() + msg.rs->keepalive_time;
4325  msg.status = 0;
4326  } else {
4327  msg.status = EBADF;
4328  }
4329  break;
4330  case RS_SVC_NOOP:
4331  msg.status = 0;
4332  break;
4333  default:
4334  break;
4335  }
4336  write(svc->sock[1], &msg, sizeof msg);
4337 }
4338 
4339 /*
4340  * Send a 0 byte RDMA write with immediate as keep-alive message.
4341  * This avoids the need for the receive side to do any acknowledgment.
4342  */
4343 static void tcp_svc_send_keepalive(struct rsocket *rs)
4344 {
4345  fastlock_acquire(&rs->cq_lock);
4346  if (rs_ctrl_avail(rs) && (rs->state & rs_connected)) {
4347  rs->ctrl_seqno++;
4348  rs_post_write(rs, NULL, 0,
4349  rs_msg_set(RS_OP_CTRL, RS_CTRL_KEEPALIVE), 0,
4350  (uint64_t)NULL, (uint64_t)NULL);
4351  }
4352  fastlock_release(&rs->cq_lock);
4353 }
4354 
4355 static void *tcp_svc_run(void *arg)
4356 {
4357  struct rs_svc *svc = arg;
4358  struct rs_svc_msg msg;
4359  struct pollfd fds;
4360  uint32_t now, next_timeout;
4361  int i, ret, timeout;
4362 
4363  ret = rs_svc_grow_sets(svc, 16);
4364  if (ret) {
4365  msg.status = ret;
4366  write(svc->sock[1], &msg, sizeof msg);
4367  return (void *)(uintptr_t)ret;
4368  }
4369 
4370  tcp_svc_timeouts = svc->contexts;
4371  fds.fd = svc->sock[1];
4372  fds.events = POLLIN;
4373  timeout = -1;
4374  do {
4375  poll(&fds, 1, timeout * 1000);
4376  if (fds.revents)
4377  tcp_svc_process_sock(svc);
4378 
4379  now = rs_get_time();
4380  next_timeout = ~0;
4381  for (i = 1; i <= svc->cnt; i++) {
4382  if (tcp_svc_timeouts[i] <= now) {
4383  tcp_svc_send_keepalive(svc->rss[i]);
4384  tcp_svc_timeouts[i] =
4385  now + svc->rss[i]->keepalive_time;
4386  }
4387  if (tcp_svc_timeouts[i] < next_timeout)
4388  next_timeout = tcp_svc_timeouts[i];
4389  }
4390  timeout = (int)(next_timeout - now);
4391  } while (svc->cnt >= 1);
4392 
4393  return NULL;
4394 }
